songLyric.verse1: Muteya buha engubi, Ukunge mundu ghosi Oyukow’engulu eyi, Atsire amalolo.
songLyric.chorus: Muteya we buh’engubi, Ibughaye kutsibu Minyisy’abosi engulu, Balwe omo miriki.
songLyric.verse2: Ubuhire y’oko bitwa, Omoli n’omo misya; Kandi n’omo ngetsi hosi, Baminye erilama.
songLyric.verse3: Ubughaye y’omo nzira, N’ahabisire hosi; Tat’akabalindirira, Byosi byabiryusula.
songLyric.verse4: Buhira abatohire, Nabo balamibawe, Yesu akabirikira, Mwase mulamibawe.

songLyric.verse1: Omukama anemwasa, Oyowatwanza kwenene ; Anemwasa erilamya, Abamwasi bosi
songLyric.chorus: Ko luyi, ko luyi, Mwami Yesu any’oko luyi Anemwasa, anemwasa, Mulamya oko luyi.
songLyric.verse2: Binyikalo by’endata, Byabiriberererera; Linw’endambi y’erilama, Lero mwikirirye.
songLyric.verse3: Amalwa asyaby’atyahwa, Sihendisyabya buholo; Nikw’ebibi n’oluholo, Byasyaghuswa kundu.
songLyric.verse4: Nery’omo kihugho kihya, Twasikala n’erikota, Sihendisyaby’oluholo, Hate n’obulighe.

songLyric.verse1: Nasyamulangira Yesu, Tuli nay’elubula ; Aho nasyamuminyira, Kwali yo wanyikwira.
songLyric.chorus: Nasyamulangira Yesu, Tuli nay’elubula, Nyiminy’erihenia liwe, nasyamupipa kundu.
songLyric.verse2: Lino ngamulindirira, Akandisyasa kandi ; Ekiro akandisyasa, Ngandisyamulola ko.
songLyric.verse3: Twasyatsemera ewuwe, Ahate n’omulighe ; Abatyowa wabiryowa, Ah’omwirimya ate.
songLyric.verse4: Twasyatsemer’élubula, Nasyamulangira yo, Nasyabya na Yesu Kristo, Y’Omulamiya waghe.

songLyric.verse1: Hali engulu yowene eyo buholo, Yabirilwa hali kutsibu ; Kusangwa Omulamya anemwendisyasa, Kandy’asimya Obwami buwe.
songLyric.chorus: Asyasa, nyasi akandisyasa, Nikw’asyasa kundu kundu, Abaghendi bosi, baluha basyaluhukibwa na Nyamuhanga.
songLyric.verse2: Amasinda asyakingukal’ekirw’ekyo, Wa Babuyirir’emuliro ; Esyondeko syabaghotsere ekulimu, basyikala muna kihugho.
songLyric.verse3: Sihali kindi kikasyatughana kandi, tukandisyimba obutseme ; Ababiritongolibwa basyalw’ehosi, Basyapipa Omwami wabo.
songLyric.verse4: Haleluy’amina, Haleluy’erikota, Twamasikya twasyikala yo, Uby’unnasikire kandi ubye n’amaha, Lero wasyambal’Akakira.

songLyric.verse1: Muteya we misnyisy’endambi, Ewetu ni hali kwehi ? Ati : Mwirimya ni munene, Nikwa bukandikya, Sighulire, genda luba, Suleke erikirirya, Nikwa ekiro wasyahika, Kiro ky’erikota.
songLyric.verse2: Umubwire kyabugha nawe, Anzubirya ndeke ati : Amalwa akisiyinahwa, Sulwe omo malwa, Sughubahe, sukw’obuba, Yitsinge oko mubiri, Nikwa twasyaban’ébihembo, Twamabisangana.
songLyric.verse3: Ngabulaya ebyabumbawa, Bikanyisubirya bitya: Ekihugho kikasyahwa ho, hasyasa ekindi. Sulir’ebiminyikalo, Bikakangaya hotuli, Ebindu byosi byabumbawa bilindir’engubi.
songLyric.verse4: Ewetu si hali kutsibu, Tutseme omo Mitima, Tuhumule ko twasyalama butsira bulighe. Sulire twasyahika yo, Bulighe bukandisyahwa, Sitwendisyabul’obuholo mo Muyi wa Tata.

songLyric.verse1: Imwe ababuyirire, Muteghaye biro byosi ; Muhamb’esiseke syenyu, Lind’Omwamy’ali hakuhi.
songLyric.chorus: Omwami, anemwasa. Anemwasa n’erihenia, Yesu arimya engoma, Omwami, anemwasa.
songLyric.verse2: Wibuk’Omuhanganiri, Erilamya n’olukogho ; Embita n’erisimibwa, Wibuk’erilama eryo.
songLyric.verse3: Sihaly’amami atehwa, Wowe esyongali siwe ; Bwir’abosi olukogho, Ni ndambi y’erilamibwa.
songLyric.verse4: Ebihanda byasyahwa ho, Kristo let’Obwami bwawe, Kihugho kisiy’ikahwa, Mutseme babirilama.

songLyric.verse1: Asyaswasa,  Asyaswasa Omulamya wetu, Asyatwala, Asyatwala abandu buwe.
songLyric.chorus: Twasyatsema kutsibu, Erya ewa Yesu. N’erikota na kera, Situlilwa yo.
songLyric.verse2: Imwe bosi mwangaminya Omwatsi wa Yesu ; Mwangakwama n’omutima, Imwasyalama.
songLyric.verse3: Yesu Kristo asyaswasa, Ekiro tutasi ; Umulinde, umulinde ng’Omwami wawe.

songLyric.verse1: Ekiro Yesu akasyatwenda abandu buwe; N’engunga ya Yesu ikasyabugha, Abandu buwe bosi bakandisyalwa mwisinda Twasyahindana erya elubula.
songLyric.chorus: Nasyabya yo elubula, Haghuma na Yesu Kristo, Nasyabya yo elubula: Ngandikwama Yesu mo nzira syosi.
songLyric.verse2: Yesu amatubirikira omo mitima yetu; Syanzire abandu bakasyahera Twamaleka ebibi byosi bya balimu babi, Yesu angatulamya lino lino.
songLyric.verse3: Inga tukole omubiri wa Yesu gho luba; Omwirimya akasyahika luba, N’abandu bangi sibasi Omulamiya wetu Tubirikire bo balame lino.

songLyric.verse1: Buha engubi bosi bowe yo, Yesu akandisyasa; Neryo mwimbe banze n’obutseme : Yesu akandisyasa.
songLyric.chorus: Asyahika, Asyahika,Omwami akasyasa.
songLyric.verse2: Kangiriraya ehosi-hosi,  Yesu akandisyasa; Asyasa n’erihenia ering : Yesu akandisyasa.
songLyric.verse3: Neryo buh’engubi omo ngetsi, Yesu akandisyasa; Buhir’engubi n’omo biharo: Yesu akandisyasa.
songLyric.verse4: Neryo buh’engubi n’omo bitwa, Yesu akandisyasa; Emyatsi ikaghend’omwihunga : Yesu akandisyasa.
songLyric.verse5: Linw’ebihanda byamatsurana, Yesu akandisyasa; Amenge amakanya uminye : Yesu akandisyasa.

songLyric.verse1: Twasyahindan’élubula, Oko wetu ewa Yesu; Abandu ababiryanza, batsemire kutsibu-tsibu.
songLyric.chorus: Twasyahindan’élubula, Oko lusi lubuya olw’engebe, Bandu bosi batsemire eyo, Endambi syosi bane yo.
songLyric.verse2: Baliyo bakimb’olwimbo, Obulighe sibuli yo; Olwimbo lwa Yesu Kristo, Omukama Munene wetu.
songLyric.verse3: Esiseke sisiri yo, Omwirimya ahwere yo; Yesu Kristo ni Luseke Olwa bandu bosi abiwe.
songLyric.verse4: Abayo bali n’amaka, Sibelwala n’erihola; Ebibi byosi byamahwa, Sibyangatok’eringira yo.

songLyric.verse1: Mulamya ngandikukwama, Aho wanzire hosi; Aho ukaya ngukwame, Mwami ngandikukwama.
songLyric.chorus: Mulamya ngandikukwama, wanyutir’omusasi Wamabul’oyu kwanzire, Ingye ngandikukwama.
songLyric.verse2: Nahw’enzira yamakingwa, Naho yamasendibwa; Mowalaba muyo kera, Ndabemo ngwit’ihenia.
songLyric.verse3: Naho wamabya n’endwala, Ngalengwa ko kutsibu; Wabirirengwa ko nawe, Mwami ngandikukwama.
songLyric.verse4: Wamandaby’omo bulighe, Lero namabya Mwera; Nawe mowabya Omwera, Naghe ngandikukwama.
songLyric.verse5: Nomo wangananyitwala No omo mutobero; Nawe mowasoka utya, Naghe ngandikukwama.

songLyric.verse1: Hali eyisoko yoswire, N’omusasi wa Yesu Kristo; Oyo anzire erihenia, Angahika ku Yesu, Asyalusibwa ko ebibi, N’engumbu y’enzira nyibi, Oyo anzire erihenia, Angahika ku Yesu.
songLyric.verse2: Itwe tunemutsema lingi, Twabiribana Omulamya; Ali n’akaghala kanene, K’erikinda Sitani. Yesu mwakinda oluholo, Mwalubuka omwisinda, Ali n’akaghala kanene, k’erikinda Sitani.
songLyric.verse3: Oyo abirikw’oko muti, Akandisyahika akandi; N’erisyatutwala eghuwe, Ahate n’omulighe. Tusikaye erina riwe, Tumuh’emitima yetu; Tukandisyahika ewuwe, Ahate n’obiulighe.
songLyric.verse4: Mwami nyinemukuhalya ko, Mba erikirirya ry’ekundu; N’omusasi wawe anyerye, Mba akalamu kawe, Mba akalamu kawe Yesu mban’erilamibwa Nawe; N’omusasi wawe anyerye, Mba akalamu kawe.

title: NYIHENAYE KWILAB’AMATWA
englishTitle: Lord Jesus, I Long To Be Perfectly Whole

songLyric.verse1: Mwami Yesu nyanzire kunzondola Nyanzire ubye mo mutima waghe Inaleka erisaba esyisumba, Unyeraye nyihenaye kwenene.
songLyric.chorus: Nyihenaye kwilab’amatwa, Umba eryera ngandikutsemesya.
songLyric.verse2: Mwami undebay’ighune n’ewawe, Mba eriher’obuhere bowene. Butsira eritikatika nyiyihe Unyeraye nyihenaye kwenene.
songLyric.verse3: Yesu nyinemukulirira lino; Nyitoke erikulinda Mukama. Unyuwanaye omo Musasi wawe, Unyeraye nyihenaye kwenene.
songLyric.verse4: Mulamya nyinemukulindirira; Yesu as’umbe omutim’owene Suliwaghan’omundu n’omughuma, Unyeraye nyihenaye kwenene.

songLyric.verse1: Ghowe amakuta, anemutogha; Ghosi ni wa Yesu, tumutekere.
songLyric.chorus: Togha, togha, togha, togha amakut’ayo, Ghosi ni wa Yesu, Tumutekere.
songLyric.verse2: Akalw’omo byala, Anemutogha; Buhere bwa Yesu, Ko Bana buwe.
songLyric.verse3: Lino tuli Bana, N’ekyo tuwite; Neryo twamakula, Tukandikanya.
songLyric.verse4: Twamayira bike, Tubihy’Omwami; Asyangirira byo, Atulamaye.

songLyric.verse1: Yesu Kristo mwanyanza, mwaliha olubanza; Ingye ndi mundu molo, Naye ni wa Kaghala.
songLyric.chorus: Yesu anzire, abandu bosi, Monzo ni Mwenge, Ekyo ni wasingya.
songLyric.verse2: Yesu Kristo anzire, Imwe ab’ekihugho; Kumbe mwamabinduka, Iniabah’erilama.
songLyric.verse3: Yesu Kristo Mukama, Unyilamaya lino; Namaleka Sitani, N’ebibi byosi byaghe.
songLyric.verse4: Yesu Kristo wasyasa, Wasyanyitwal’ewawe; Ngandikol’omubiri, Inakulindirira.

songLyric.verse1: Weray’ebyala byaghe, Byere kundu kundu; Ko nabiriha Yesu, Byangamukolera.
songLyric.chorus: Sinendiy’ahandi, N’erimusigha, N’erisiky’oghundi, Ni nawe Yesu.
songLyric.verse2: Ndegh’amatwi n’eryowa, Nyikol’ébibuya; Ebyo ngowa ambwira, Bustir’italya byo.
songLyric.verse3: Ngateghay’amaboko, Ebyo angakola; Ngunge kw’eryendererya, Akolere Yesu.

songLyric.verse1: Nyipipire Olwanzo, Lolukanyibwira; Riyirira bandi ndeke, Bangaminya Yesu.
songLyric.chorus: Tata we ingye mwana wawe, Tata we ngukwamirire; Nyipipire Olwanzo, Lolukanyibwira Riyirira bandi ndeke, Bangaminya Yesu.
songLyric.verse2: Ekihugho ky’ebibi, Buligh’erihola; Sibingaghe erikol’omubiri wa Yesu.
songLyric.verse3: Ekihugho ky’ebibi, Buligh’erihola; Sibingaghe erikol’omubiri wa Yesu.
songLyric.verse4: Nyipipire Olwanzo, Lolukanyibwira; Riyirira bandi ndeke, Bangaminya Yesu.

songLyric.verse1: Twend’abasirikani, Bandu b’Omwami; Yesu an’embere, Tumukwamire, Tutwaly’omusalama, Atuby’embere, Tukwamirir’eriyalwa tukind’Enzighu:
songLyric.chorus: Tughende Abasirikani, Tuyalwe twe bose, Tughende na Yesu, Tukind’Enzighu.
songLyric.verse2: Endeko sya Sitani, Syamakw’obuba; Syamowa Omwami, Isyatibita, Obutseme bw’Ababuyirire kundu; Banemupipa Omwami n’erimusima.
songLyric.verse3: E Kanisa y’Omwami ine haghuma; Inemuhangana, Eriyakinda, Siyendighabana ho, Erikirirya; Erikangiriry’ighuma, Mwami Mughuma.
songLyric.verse4: Sihaly’Amamy’atehwa, akandisyahwa; Neryo e Kanisa, Ikaksyakota, Kulimu n’oluholo, Sibyesyakinda; Kristo abirilaghana Syaliyiteba.
songLyric.verse5: Neryo muyalwe bosi, Tutimbatimbe; Twimbire haghuma, Mirenge yetu. Tumwimbire, tusime, Omwami Yesu, Warihenia lyeryubahwa, kwilaba bosi.

title: LEBAYA SUTEBAWE
englishTitle: My Soul, Be On Thy Guard

songLyric.verse1: Lebaya sutebawe, Ebibi byatimba; Bikasa eritimba-timba, Mbusuy’elubula.
songLyric.verse2: Lebay’iwe usabe, Sulwe omo malwa; Uhangan’ebiro byosi, Yes’akuwatikya.
songLyric.verse3: Uwe suliwakinda, Susighe engabo; Lebay’amalw’asyahwa, Wasimya akakira.

songLyric.verse1: Ibuk’omutima waghe, Sonda-sonda byowene; Ulw’amalwa aghowene, Wasyakokibwa yo.
songLyric.verse2: Omukama akusonda, Ghenda luba witabe; Omukama asyahemba, Ababirikinda.
songLyric.verse3: Endeko yikalebaya, Ikakulindirira; Siwibuke eby’ enyuma, Lol’embere syawe.
songLyric.verse4: Mulamya wetu twanzire, Tukasingana kuwe; Twamasa erikupipa, Tunakusikirye.

title: NASA KU MUSALABA
englishTitle: I Am Coming To The Cross

songLyric.verse1: Nasa ku musalaba, Nduhire, mwera, mumu; Sindisagha na hake, Ngasonda iwo wene.
songLyric.chorus: Mwami indi n’amahga, Mulamya waghe Mwenge, Nyikangy’embere syawe, Mwami Yesu, nyilamye.
songLyric.verse2: Nayitsutsa We kera, Mo bulighe bw’ebibi; Yesu mwambwira ati: Asa, Ngakulamaye.
songLyric.verse3: Lino nayihaghura, Sinyibuk’ekihugho; Mbye wawe, Mwami Yesu, Imay’ebyaghe byosi.
songLyric.verse4: Ndi n’amaha w’ebyawe, Wanywutir’omusasi ; Lino namayikangya, Indi ku Musalaba.
songLyric.verse5: Nzemire namalama, Yesu kaghala kaghe; Sindi ho n’ekitingu, Nyipipire Embuli.

songLyric.verse1: Mwami mb’Omuyisa wawe, Uhitaye gho busa ; We Mulamya sundabe ko, Neryo mba Omuyisa.
songLyric.chorus: Muyisa, Muyisa, Nery’umbe Omuyisa.
songLyric.verse2: Sunzighe Tata Mubuya, Ebibi byamanduhya ; Ndolere owerighuswa, Nikwa unyighenyere.
songLyric.verse3: Namabulir’omo bibi, Namakuhitaniya; Namatimbwa n’ekihugho, Undusaye mo lino.
songLyric.verse4: S’undabe ko Omukama, Nyiribule ameso ; Unyiminyisaye Tata, Nzire eby’ekihugho.

songLyric.verse1: Kirimu Kibuyirire, Asa ngasibe nawe ; Nyusul’omuyisa wawe, Asa, asa nyusule.
songLyric.chorus: Nyusule, nyusule, Yesu asa nyusule; Nyusul’omuyisa wawe, Asa asa nyusule.
songLyric.verse2: Wangkatok’erinyusula, Nibya ingye sinyasi ; Kirimu kya Nyamuhanga, Asa, asa nyusule.
songLyric.verse3: Sinyikalir’indi molo, Nyinekunamira ; Musibikya w’elubula, Mba olwanzo, nyusule.
songLyric.verse4: Wase nyere kandi ndame, Luhukya Omutima ; Niwe ukambumulaya, Unyusulaye lino.

songLyric.verse1: Nyikwanzire Mwami, Omulamya waghe ; Omulenge wawe, Kalet’obuholo.
songLyric.chorus: Mwitungi n’omo kiro, Nyikwanzire Mwami, Unzumule Mulamya, Tusibe nawe.
songLyric.verse2: Nyikwanzire Mwami, Mbye hakuhi nawe ; Ndok’ikind’enzighu, Ndi haghuma nawe.
songLyric.verse3: Nyikwanzire Mwami, Butseme, bulighe ; Asa, lino-lino : Nyitok’eryeribwa.
songLyric.verse4: Nyikwanzire Mwami, Mbwir’ebyo wanzire ; Unyibegheraye, Mukama, Mulamya.
songLyric.verse5: Nyikwanzire Mwami, Mwamy’owene kundu ; Nzondole mbye wawe, Uwe Mutsumulwa.

songLyric.verse1: Yesu mbye wawe, nyikokye, n’ebyaghe ngwite byosi ; Nyikwanzire ngwikirirye, Ngukwame ndambi syosi.
songLyric.chorus: Nyikuh’ebyosi, nyikuh’ebyosi, Mulamya waghe Mubuya, Nyikuh’ebyosi.
songLyric.verse2: Yesu ndi wawe, nyikokye, Ingye muke ngusabe ; Namughut’eby’ekihugho, Lino Yesu nyikokye.
songLyric.verse3: Yesu ndi wawe nyikokye, Mwami nyibye o wawe ; Tum’Omusibiky’Ambwire, Ko nabiribya Wawe.
songLyric.verse4: Yesu nyikuhe ebyosi, Musibikya, Mutima ; Nyipipe erighanyira, Ngusab’ebiro byosi.

songLyric.verse1: Lino nyinemwasa ko ndi, Mulamya, Ndamaye n’omusasi wawe ; Nyitaby’omuleng’akambirikira : Ngasa, Mbuli ya Nyamuhanga.
songLyric.verse2: Lino nyinemwasa ko ndi, Mulamya, Nyeray’omutima kw’ebibi ; Uwe mweny’omusasi w’erilamya : Ngasa, Mbuli ya Nyamuhanga.
songLyric.verse3: Nyinemwasa ebibi byamanduhya, Ngakindawa ebiro byosi ; Hali bingi ebikanyitimba ko : Ngasa, Mbuli ya Nyamuhanga.
songLyric.verse4: Lino nyinemwasa ngye ndi, Muhanya, ndi ne mumu, ndi na mutsiha ; Ebyanganyerya ngabisung’ewawe : Ngasa, Mbuli ya Nyamuhanga.
songLyric.verse5: Lino nyinemwasa Unyikokaye, Nyusulaye erikirirya ; Nyitok’ikinda ebikandebaya : Ngasa, Mbuli ya Nyamuhanga.
songLyric.verse6: Lino nyinemwasa, mba Lwanzo Lwawe, Iwambohol’omo miriki ; Eritsuka lino namabya wawe : Ngasa, Mbuli ya Nyamuhanga.

songLyric.verse1: Mwami ni Mwenge, ka mwatuma Yesu ; N’eritulamya lino mo nzira nyibi.
songLyric.chorus: Haleluya tumukwame, Haleluya kundu, Haleluya Yesu Kristo, Utulamaye.
songLyric.verse2: Tuyire Yesu, Munene ng’Omwami ; Kusangw’abirihola n’eritulamya.
songLyric.verse3: Utusulaye, no Lwanzo lo Lwawe ; N’obuteseme bunene, Bw’ebiro vyosi.
songLyric.verse4: Tulek’ebindu, By’ekihugho kino ; Tukwame Yesu Kristo Mukama wetu.
songLyric.verse5: Tuhe omuhwa, Tusulaye kundu ; Omundu mundu, Akwanze kundu kundu.

songLyric.verse1: Ngasonde eryera, Saba suluhe, Usibe n’Omwami, Umusikaye; Wanze Abakristo, Lamy’Abakoni, Siwibirirawe, Erimusaba.
songLyric.verse2: Ngasonde eryera, Bungi bw’ebibi, Usibe na Yesu, Ahabisire ; Umusamalire, Wasyabya nga Ye, Bosi basyaminya, Kumusosire.
songLyric.verse3: Ngasonde eryera, Akusondole, Eriyibombeka embere siwe, Ko wanabya kosi, Wasyamubwira; Usikaye Yesu, Umowe lino.
songLyric.verse4: Ngasonde eryra, Kungo’omutima, Lengekania ndeke, Suyire luba; Wowe Musibikya, Ubye n’olwanzo, Wasyatunganana, Riy’elubula.

songLyric.verse1: Ubye nethu n’akaghala kwe, Netu sitwangubaha Sitani, Mo mwirimya w’ekihugho kino, Wangabya luseke lwetu, Kristo.
songLyric.verse2: Ubye nethu n’erihenia lyawe, Biro ni bike eby’ekihugho, N’Abandu bangabindu luba, Uwe w’Erikota, Ubye netu.
songLyric.verse3: Unye nethu emighulu yosi, Nindi angatulamya kw’ebibi? Nindi angatuhangania nga We? Tukayiketera We Mukama.
songLyric.verse4: Ubye nethu, Tata w’Erikota ; Tughaniray’oluholo lwawe, Tukulinde k’omubiri wawe, Yesu Mulamiya, ubye netu.

title: ULANGIRE BWAMIRA
englishTitle: Day Is Dying In The West

songLyric.verse1: Ulangire bwamira, Bwirire, tuluhuke ; Ebyakakala by’ekiro, Byaka tusabe Omwami, Itwe bosi.
songLyric.chorus: Mwenge, Mwenge, Mwenge : Mwami Yesu, Wayitsungany’ehosi, Byosi bikakupipa : Nyamuhanga.
songLyric.verse2: Omwami gho Buyingo, Hindany’abakwanzire ; Ubusulaye olwanzo, Ubabindule mo bawe : Bakupipe.
songLyric.verse3: Omwirimya akanya, Tukingir’ighenyera ; Tukutwalir’emitima yetu, omo Bwami bwawe : Nyamuhanga.
songLyric.verse4: Utuh’erikirirya, Twasyahola Mukama; Twasyabana kyakakala, N’omwirimya asyahwa ho: Tukupipe.

songLyric.verse1: Omulamya Lyuba ly’Omutima; Omwirimya syahika ewuwe, Wamabya hakuhi mwami, Sinendisyubaha na hake.
songLyric.verse2: Omughulu w’eriyaghotsera, Ngaluhuka emibiri yosi. Umb’erikulengekania, Ngotser’indi haghuma nawe.
songLyric.verse3: Undind’omo kiro no mwitungi; Sinangatoka tute haghuma, Undinde omo malighe, Kusangwa singwite amaka.
songLyric.verse4: Omughulu nyinemwendibuka; Na ho ngandiya eriyakola, Omo kiro no mwitungi Kusangwa Iwe kyakakala.

songLyric.verse1: Yesu niwe Ribwe ryetu, Obuwamo bw’eritsuku; Niw’utulamya malighe, N’obuwamo bw’eritsuku.
songLyric.chorus: Ribwe, busayiro bw’abandu, Kitsutsu ky’eriluhukira; Musondoli, Utetalaya, Obuwamo bw’eritsuku.
songLyric.verse2: Anyilamya omwaghalwa, N’obuwamo bw’eritsuku; Tuli nawe sindyubaha, N’obuwamo bw’eritsuku.
songLyric.verse3: Emigheri yamasenda, N’obuwamo bw’eritsuku; N’Omulamya wetu kundu, N’obuwamo bw’eritsuku.
songLyric.verse4: Ribwe kundu, ry’erilamya, N’obuwamo bw’eritsuku; Tuwatikye mo malighe, N’obuwamo bw’eritsuku.

songLyric.verse1: Nyitsemire Omulamya, Akangung’omo Binywa biwe; Aho ngaya n’erikola, N’okuboko kwa Yesu kunzondole.
songLyric.chorus: Nyitsemire akanzondola, Yesu Musondoli w’ekwenene, Nyanzire erimukolera, N’okuboko kwa Yesu kunzondole.
songLyric.verse2: Namabya ndi mo bulighe, Kutse nyitsemire kutsibu; Mo buholo, n’eryaghalwa, N’okuboko kwa Yesu kunzondole.
songLyric.verse3: Mwami nyanzire tusibe Nawe sinyiyitonge-tonge; Nyibye n’obutseme kundu, N’okuboko kwa Yesu kunzondole.
songLyric.verse4: Mibiri yaghe yamahwa, Nginde omwighenyera lyawe; Sindyubaha n’oluholo, N’okuboko kwa Yesu kunzondole.

songLyric.verse1: Nyanzir’obuholo bombomba ng’olusi, Naho nabya n’obulighe; Ko nyiri kosi nyanzir’éribugha: Ndi n’obuholo mo mutima.
songLyric.chorus: Buholo, Bubuya, Ndi n’obuholo mo mutima.
songLyric.verse2: Sitani andebya ngabya n’obuhanua, Ngwity’amaha w’eriminya; Nikwa Kristo mwasunga ko ndi molo, Kyatuma iniut’omusasi.
songLyric.verse3: Nzemire kutsibu, nabiribuyirwa, Sihasigher’ekighuma; Mobyabambwa nawe ko Musalaba, Mutima waghe sim’Omwami.
songLyric.verse4: Mwami Yesu kiro wasyas’eritwenda, Kirw’ebitu byasyalundwa; Engub’ibughe, Omwamy’andaghale, Ndi n’obuholo mo mutima.

songLyric.verse1: Nyanzir’obwira b’omo lubula, N’amaboko waw’erikota; Nzemire kundu, nyinasikire, N’amaboko waw’erikota.
songLyric.chorus: Ndame, Ndama, N’amaboko waw’erikota, Ndame, Ndama, N’amaboko waw’erikota.
songLyric.verse2: Nzemire ko Yesu anzondola, N’amaboko waw’erikota; Nzungir’amaka atunganene, N’amaboko waw’erikota.
songLyric.verse3: Singwire buba, Nyinasikire, N’amaboko waw’erikota; Namahehera, Nyitunganene, N’amaboko waw’erikota.

title: NAMAKWIKIRIRYA
englishTitle: My Faith Looks Up To Thee

songLyric.verse1: Namakwikirirya, Mbuli ye Kalwari : We Mulamya; ngusabe unyowe, Ndamaye kw’ebibi: Eritsuka lino, ngukwamire.
songLyric.verse2: Nyusul’ighenyera, mba mbita yowene: Mba omuhwa Ko wanyiholera, Ngukangay’olwanzo; Lutehwa lukaka ng’omuliro.
songLyric.verse3: Bibi byamatimba, ngayir’obulighe : Unzondole, Ndusy’omo mwirimya, Ndusaye kw’ebibi; Kandi sundekere hali Kuwe.

songLyric.verse1: Mbye hakuhi nawe, Mwami wetu, Mo nangahanikwa ko Musalaba; Nabya nyinemwimba, Mbye hakuhi Mwami, Mbye hakuhi Mwami, Nyibye hakuhi.
songLyric.verse2: Mbye hakuhi nawe Mwami wetu, Mo Malighe ghosi, Umbanganire. Yesu twikalaye, Tuh’erisasira, Mbye hakuhi Mwami, Nyibye hakuhi.
songLyric.verse3: Mbye hakuhi nawe, Mwami wetu ; Unyihanganire ebiro byosi. Enzighu yamasa, Unyibwire Mwami, Mbye hakuhi Mwami, Nyibye hakuhi.
songLyric.verse4: Mbye hakuhi nawe, Mwami wetu ; Wabirikingula, Omo lubula, Mulikyetu sika, Ukandilamibwa, Mbye hakuhi Mwami, Nyibye hakuhi.

songLyric.verse1: Iwe ghuyitsinge sighuluwe, Nomo wangowa ebikalire; Wasyahanganibwa n’Olukuka, Twamatimbwa n’ebibi.
songLyric.chorus: Tukasikira ku Kristo Olukuka, We Lukuka tweghemere, Tubye n’obuholo, n’erisasira: Muliro wa Nyamuhanga.
songLyric.verse2: Yitsinge by’unasikire, Hatikana bya n’erikirirya; Lukuka lukatuh’erikinda, Muna kihugho ky’ebibi.
songLyric.verse3: Yitsinge kundu binatolere, Busayiro bwawe burikare; Lukuka lukamus’ekerera, Ng’atsighuts’ibikakyo.
songLyric.verse4: Yitsinge ebibi bikakye, N’erikola lyebinyekwe; Olwanzo lwawe lukalangirira: Yitsinge kundu kihugho.

songLyric.verse1: Nasyabya nyinikirirye, Musasi gh’Omulamya, Sinendisyakwama ghundi, Nina Yesu Iyo wene.
songLyric.chorus: Kuwe Yesu namimana, Nikwa handi ni museghe, Nikwa handi ni museghe.
songLyric.verse2: Omwirimy anyiribya, Yesu niw’erighenyera; Mo Malighe n’obuhanya, Syendisyatusighania.
songLyric.verse3: Nyeribawe mo Musasi, Yo wamba erimukwama; Nangabya omo bulighe, Akangwatiky’inyanzikya.
songLyric.verse4: Inyasyasa ngo mulenge, Ow’Engunga yisikire; Nyambal’eritunganene, Sinendibya n’ekitingu.

songLyric.verse1: Twikale n’Omwami, Twowe ekinyw’ekyo, atuhir’omo nzira mbuya, Tusikaye kundu, Akikale netu, n’abamwikirirye abosi.
songLyric.chorus: Musikaye, sihali erindi ilama, Yesu musa, Mwikirirye kundu.
songLyric.verse2: Sihali nzukula, bitu bihindane, Amaseka ibyaseghera; Sihali n’obuba, kutse n’eryubaha, Bikahwa twamamwikirirya.
songLyric.verse3: Sitwendighalibwa, kutse n’obulighe, Niw’utuhembula kutsibu; Sihali obwera, sihali ryaghalwa, Twasyatsumulwa twamasikya.
songLyric.verse4: Sitwangayitsutsa, Riyir’obutseme, Twabirek’ebibi byosi; Kw’ighenyera Liwe, Hitya ahitaye, N’isimi ry’Ababuyirire.
songLyric.verse5: Twasyatsemerayo, Haghuma n’Omwami, Twasyabya Naye n’erikota; Tusikaye kundu, Asyabyatutuma, Sitwendisyubaha na hake.

songLyric.verse1: Yesu abye nawe ehosi, Neryo twikale haghuma, Akalembera n’amenge, Yesu abye nawe ehosi.
songLyric.chorus: Ekiro twasyahindana yo, Twasyabya haghuma na Yesu, Ekiro twasyahindana yo, Yesu abye nawe ehosi.
songLyric.verse2: Yesu abye nawe ehosi, Akulind’omo malighe, Asyakulembera kundu, Yesu abye nawe ehosi.
songLyric.verse3: Yesu abye nawe ehosi, No ko ndambi y’amalighe, Akuwaty’oko kuboko, Yesu abye nawe ehosi.
songLyric.verse4: Yesu abye nawe ehosi, Asyakutsumula kundu, Abatulîre enzîra, Yesu abye nawe ehosi.

songLyric.verse1: Twamikala n’abira betu sitwendikw’engitsi, Nikwa twamabighabana, Tukabya n’obulighe.
songLyric.chorus: Kihugho sitweghabana, Twasabya haghuma Mo Kihugho ky’Obuholo, Sitwandighabana.
songLyric.verse2: Twamibuka abira betu, Tukatsema kundu, Twasyabugh’emibiri yetu, Twasyakotera yo.
songLyric.verse3: Sitwendisya-swalaghana yo, Twahik’elubula Twasyaban’eritsema ringi, Twimbe ndambi syosi.

songLyric.verse1: Rihol’emwisi wa Yesu, Oko Babuya niya to; Sibebuka n’eririra, Eyo sibangatebibwa.
songLyric.verse2: Eriya to omu Yesu, Ni Buluhuke bubuya. Ni butseme bw’abamwasi, Ko basyahabwa engebe.
songLyric.verse3: Eriya to omu Yesu, N’eribukibwa mo Naye, N’akaghala k’Omulamya, Sikekindwa n’oluholo.
songLyric.verse4: Eriya to omu Yesu, Bakasyowa omulenge, Asisinda syakingulwa, Abuwe bosi balame.

title: OMUGHULU MUBÎRÎ WAGHE AHWERE
englishTitle: When My Life Work Is Ended

songLyric.verse1: Omughulu mubiri waghe ahwere hano, Ngandihike elubula habuya, Nasyamuminya Omutongolya waghe luba N’akandisyatsuka erinyikokya.
songLyric.chorus: Nasyaminya Yesu Kristo, Kusangwa abirinyitongolya, Nasyaminya Yesu Kristo, N’esyongolu omo byala biwe.
songLyric.verse2: Abakristo bangi, baghendire emuliro, Bakatulinda n’obuholo buwe; Twasyatsema haghuma emuliro wa Yesu Nikwa nyanzire Mukama ko bosi.
songLyric.verse3: Nganditsema erilangira obusu buwe, N’olwanzo luli oko meso wuwe. Ngandisyamupipa busana n’olwanzo luwe N’obwenge buwe bwabirinyilamya.

songLyric.verse1: Umbe Bibliya yo yikanzemesya, Unyisondolere muyo Mwami, Ekyakakala kyayo sikyerima, Ko Yesu mwasa eritowisya.
songLyric.chorus: Umbe Bibliya yo yikanzemesya, Nzondolwe nay’omo nzira nyike Amatehgeko wayo gho mabuya, Akaminyisay’enzira kundu.
songLyric.verse2: Umbe Bibliya mo malighe waghe, Omughulu ngatimwa n’ebibi, Umb’ebinywa ebyo Yesu abugha, Nikwa yowen’akambumulaya.
songLyric.verse3: Umbe Bibliy’ingoleraye kundu, Kand’indind’ebitegho by’ahisi, Lo Luseke lukak’omo mwirimya, ‘Lwakangya enzira y’obuholo.
songLyric.verse4: Umbe Bibliy’imbwir’eby’obuyingo, Kandi Utusibikaye muyo, Tuminy’enzira ikay’elubula, Tulol’okwihenia lyawe Tata.

songLyric.verse1: Akandi wanganyibwira, Ebinywa eby’engebe, Ebisihire kwenene, Ebinywa by’engebe; Ebinywa bilabire, Ebyosi eby’abandu.
songLyric.chorus: Ni by’engebe, ni by’engebe, Ebinywa bya Yesu Kristo Ni by’engebe, ni by’engebe Ebinywa bya Yesu.
songLyric.verse2: Kristo abiriha bose, Ebinywa eby’engebe, Akabirikira lino, Omundu w’ebibi Akakuha buyira, butsira erighula.
songLyric.verse3: Engulu Yowene Yiwe, Ebinywa eby’engebe Bikaleta obuholo, Wamamwikiriya, Oghundi wangalamya, Sihali no mughuma.

songLyric.verse1: Indy’oko musike w’e Yordani, Nasumba ameso, Ndangir’ekihugho kye Kanani, Aho ho byaghe biri.
songLyric.chorus: Kihugho kibuya ky’obuholo, Yisiry’oko musike abuyirire, Twasyimbira ho esyonyimbo sya Musa; Eribya na Yesu Kristo.
songLyric.verse2: Eyisiry’oko mukokoro, Hali ekyakakala, Yesu Kristo asyaby’ekyakakala kyahighahw’ekiro.
songLyric.verse3: Aho howene nasyahikey’ekiro kyahi kwehi, Nasyalangira Tat’omo meso, omo Bwami buwe.
songLyric.verse4: Nyitsemire omo mutima, Sinyanzir’eryubaha, Yorodani ikahuha ndeke, Sindyubah’erisoka.

songLyric.verse1: Twasyatsem’emibiri yahwa, Abakaghesera Yesu, Bakandisyiky’emiheke, E Yerusalem’eyo.
songLyric.chorus: Butseme hasyaby’obutseme, Sibwesyahwa kera na kera. Obutseme buli hakuhi, Tuhindanir’ewetu.
songLyric.verse2: Twasyatsema n’erimwimbira, Twasyabya tupipe Yesu, Rimusima, rimupipa, E Yérusalem’eyo.
songLyric.verse3: Twasyatsemera yo kutsibu, Omo syonyumba nyibuya, Yesu abirikokotya E Yerusalem’eyo.

songLyric.verse1: Namalengekania, Ewetu ni hakuhi, Namaseghera elubula, Ni hakuhi kutsibu.
songLyric.chorus: Eyo hakuhi ni hakuhi, Lino ndi hakuhi ye wetu; Nyinemwendihika yo.
songLyric.verse2: Omo ngonde sya Tata, Hane yo esyonyumba Syabirihimbwa kera kera, Ew’Ababuyirire.
songLyric.verse3: Nasyabya ndi hakuhi, Nasyikya emiheke, Nasyaluhuka omwaghalwa, Nambala erihenia.

songLyric.verse1: Iri ekihugho kwowene, Ekya Tata wetu Mubuya Anemukokotya ho wetu, Twasyasiba naye buholo.
songLyric.chorus: Twasyahika bolo, Oko Muyi wa Tata wetu, Twasyahindana yo, Oko Muyi mubuya kundu.
songLyric.verse2: Twasyimba oko Muyi oyo, Esyonyimbo sya Yesu Kristo, Ahate n’obulighe buke, Kutse erilwala amakoni.
songLyric.verse3: Wasingya ko Mukama Yesu, Oyo watuholera kera, Wasingya ko Mulamya wetu, Oyo watulusya kw’ebibi.

songLyric.verse1: Tubatisaye omo Kirimu, Mulamya as’eno, Tuhe Olwanzo.
songLyric.chorus1: Erisuba mo 1: Lino Mwami Yesu twakulakira, Muka Abuyirire, Tuhe olwanzo.
songLyric.verse2: Tunemulaka, Tulame lino, Tughenyere kundu, Twitwa n’ebibi.
songLyric.verse3: Muka wa Yesu, Twandaghalire, Tutsumule kundu, Tuh’Omuyisa.
songLyric.verse4: Mulengy’uwene, Abugha ati: Uli Mwanga waghe, Nyanzire kundu.
songLyric.chorus2: Erisuba mo 2: Tunemukusima, N’erikupipa Tukakuh’ewasignya, Mwami: Amina.

songLyric.verse1: Asa soko y’omuytisa, mb’omutima ng’usime, Esyonyusi esyituma, Twasyakupipa kundu. Nyighisaye, risyakupipa, Nyiminy’ihenia lyawe, Rikiriry’Obwami bwawe, Rikanyitsemesaya.
songLyric.verse2: Nyisoghe mbye wawe kundu, Ndi ho busana nawe, Nyasi ko washanyitwala, Mbik’ewawe buholo. Yesu mwanzond’inyiherire, Nabya haly’omo bibi, Asonda ndame luholo, Mwatek’engebe Yiwe.
songLyric.verse3: Ndi mo mwinda wawe Mwami, busana n’olukogho, Nyihire hakuhi nawe, nyiminy’olwanzo lwawe. Ndimbwe ko n’ebikandenga ko, Sinangakusighania: Imay’omutima waghe, Undinde ndame kundu.

songLyric.verse1: Kirimu Kibuyirire, Bya hakuhi n’Abakristo, Ngwaty’okuboko nzondole, Ndi mughendi w’emusitu. Abaluhire batseme, Bow’omulengy’owene, Abwira bo batah’imwe, Mwase ngabatwaly’ewenyu.
songLyric.verse2: Siwendisyatuhemula, Sulighan’eriwatikya, Tubye ne erikirirya, Omo malighe tukwanze. Amalighe amahika, Emitima yubaha, Mulengy’ati: Batah’imwe: Mwase ngabatwaly’ewenyu.
songLyric.verse3: Mibiri yetu yasyahwa, Twalindirir’érilama, Twibulaye ko tuliyo, Mo Bitabu by’elubula. Twisukul’ebikatebya, N’erikirirya Yesu, Mulengy’ati: Batah’imwe: Mwase nibya batwaly’ewenyu.

songLyric.verse1: Haly’eko ngasaba, Mwami! Nomonangakola ebibi, Unyeraya, Unyeraye, Maghetsi, kuts’omuliro.
songLyric.chorus: Nyeribawe, kundu Mwami, N’omuliro wamasonda Ngus’ebibi, byaheribwa, Biheribwe, Biheribye.
songLyric.verse2: Wamatunganany’obwenge, Nasyatsema n’erikupipa. Nikwa omutima ere, Alabire, Alabire.
songLyric.verse3: Namer’omutima waghe, Niho mo nasyabya n’amenge, Ngangibawe, wawe Mwami: W’elubula, w’elubula.
songLyric.verse4: Ngayiteghaya ko bibi, N’omo malangekania waghe, Mwami, n’ebyongola byosi, Sindi era, sindi era.

songLyric.verse1: Natalire hali ku Yesu, Lino namasa, Nabiribulir’omo bibi, Lero namasa.
songLyric.chorus: Nyireke, nyireke, Namabitsira, Ntirighe unyibuyire, Mwami nyikokye.
songLyric.verse2: Naherir’ebirimo bingi, Lino namasa, Namayireta nyilamaye, Lero namasa.
songLyric.verse3: Nduhir’omo bibi n’eriwa, Lino namasa, Mbye n’amaha w’olwanzo lwawe, Lero namasa.
songLyric.verse4: Yesu mwanyutir’omusasi, Lino namasa, Iyo wene wanganyilamya, Lero namasa.
songLyric.verse5: Ow’engitsi yaghe nyilame, Lino namasa, Nyera Mwami mbye ng’amatwa, Lero namasa.

songLyric.verse1: Yesu atwanzire kwilaba bose, Mwakwa oko muti n’eritulamya, Mwaheka ebibi by’abandu bosi, Ekyo ni kya wasingya.
songLyric.chorus: Oyo anzire, ase ku Yesu, Asyaban’engebe yo y’erikota; Oyo amawira, amakw’enyota, Angahika ku Yesu.
songLyric.verse2: Birikir’abandu balwe kw’ebibi, Baleke enzira y’erisyahera, Bahike ku Yesu yo Mulamiya, Oyo anzire ase.
songLyric.verse3: Neryo sinangalinda mulikyetu, Luyi lw’elubula lukingukere, Yesu ni nzira yo twangakwamire, Nawe wangingira mo.

songLyric.verse1: S’inga Mwami w’Erikota, Bosi bakusabe, Mulet’embita y’Obwami buwe, Aby’Omwami w’abosi, Mulet’embita y’Obwami buwe, Aby’Omwami w’abosi.
songLyric.verse2: Mwe Banze be Israeli, Mwe bangu, mwe bake, Musabe Oyo wabalamaya, Aby’Omwami w’abosi, Musabe Oyo wabalamaya, Aby’Omwami w’abosi.
songLyric.verse3: Bihanda byosi by’ahisi, N’ebitunga byosi, Bosi babye banamusikirye, Aby’Omwami w’abosi, Bosi babye banamusikirye, Kwali Yo Mwami w’abosi.
songLyric.verse4: Lero tumwimbire kundu, Tumukukamire, Tumupipe ne erimusima, Aby’Omwami w’abosi, Tumupipe ne erimusima, Kwali Yo Mwami w’abosi.

songLyric.verse1: Yesu Kristo watwanza, Uli Mulamya wetu, Sitani syatwanzire, Akatukola nabi, Yesu Kristo, twamasa, Oko wawe wowene, Utulamaye lino, N’omusasi owene.
songLyric.verse2: Yesu Kristo Mulamya, Watusondire kera; Twamabya bandu babi, Utulusye kw’ebibi. Utubise ho ghu, Ahate n’obulighe, Situwite kaghala, Twamasa utuhe ko.
songLyric.verse3: Engebe y’erikota, Yikalwa oko wawe, Utusulaye lino, N’omutima mubuya. Yesu twamakukwama, Utukangaye ndeke, Twamalek’ekihugho, Tukwanze biro byosi.
songLyric.verse4: Mukama mo wanyerya, No omusasi wawe, No olukogho lwawe, Lukabanika kuwe. Kuwe Mwami ngasunga, Engebe y’erikota, Omo mutima waghe, Mukama unyusule.

title: YESU TUTSEMESAYE
englishTitle: Jesus, Thou Joy Of Loving Heart

songLyric.verse1: Yesu tutsemesye itwe, Soko y’engebe kyakakala ky’abandu, Eritsema lyosi ly’ashisi, Tulitsire n’erikukwamirira.
songLyric.verse2: Obundu bw’engebe niwe, Tusond’erighulwa nawe biro byosi, Soko mbuya ityuma kundu, Tubugh’enyota mo mitima yetu.
songLyric.verse3: Omuluhi lwetu lungi, Tuyitsutse iwe Mwami wetu Mwenge, Wamasika kikutu-kutu, N’obutseme bwetu tuli haghuma.
songLyric.verse4: Yesu bya haghuma netu, Tuh’obuholo, tutseme biro byosi, Tulamye kw’ebibi byatimba, Kolery’ekyakakala mo kihugho.

songLyric.verse1: Kandi ekinywa kya Yesu, Ingye nyanzire eryowa, Mwaya ho nangakwirira, Mowa amalighe waghe.
songLyric.chorus: Akandi olwanzo, Olwanzo lwa Yesu; Ngandibwira Mulekyetu, y’erighenyera ry’Omwami.
songLyric.verse2: Kandi ekinywa kya Yesu, Ekyo kyalwa elubula, Ekikaka ng’oluseke, Omo nzira yaghe yosi.
songLyric.verse3: Kandi tupip’Omukama, oyo wasa erilamya, Oyo wasyaswasa kandi, Eribohol’ekihugho.

songLyric.verse1: Yesu nyikwanzire kundu, Namayiha; Mitsye mibi yosi, Ngaghana eyosi. Niwe Mulamya waghe, Mubuya ngw’ikirirye, Sinyiritakwanza nga, Lino Nyamuhanga.
songLyric.verse2: Nyikwanzire niwe watsuk’erinyanza; Wabirinyighul’oko muti Kalwari. Nyikwanzire, Iwe wanyambalira amahwa, Sinyiritakwanza nga, Lino Mwami Yesu.
songLyric.verse3: Nyikwanzire erihika okwihola, Nasyabya ngapipa nyinemuhumula. N’omughulu w’erihola lyaghe nasyabugha: Sinyiritakwanza nga, Lino Mwami Yesu.

title: NINDI ANGATULAMYA
englishTitle: What Can Wash Away My Sin?

songLyric.verse1: Nindi angatulamya, Nina Yesu Iyo wene, Niki kyokyangatwerya, Gh’ono musasi wa Yesu.
songLyric.chorus: Wamatuwaniya, Yesu Omulamya; Twabirikiriya, Oko Musasi wa Yesu.
songLyric.verse2: Alihire ebibi, Gh’ono musasi wa Yesu, Amalusy’olubanza, Gh’ono Musasi wa Yesu.
songLyric.verse3: Wangahika hakuhi, Oko Musasi wa Yesu, Eyindi nzira siri, Gh’ono Musasi wa Yesu.

title: UKALUHA? UBWIRE YESU
englishTitle: Are You Weary? Tell It To Jesu

songLyric.verse1: Ukaluha emwisi w’ebibi, Ubwire Yesu, Ubwire Yesu. Obulighe bwamakuhika ko? Ubwire Yesu byosi.
songLyric.chorus: Ubwire Yesu, ubwire Yesu, Iye ni Mwira kundu; Siwendisyaban’oghundi nga Ye, Ubwire Yesu byosi.
songLyric.verse2: Mbino ukatebibwa n’abandu, Ubwire Yesu, Ubwire Yesu. Wamubaha ebinywa by’abandi, Ubwire Yesu Kristo.
songLyric.verse3: Wamasagha eryendereribwa, Ubwire Yesu, Ubwire Yesu. Yesu akandikuh’obutseme, Umubwire ebyosi.
songLyric.verse4: Wamabya ukubah’oluholo, Ubwire Yesu, Ubwire Yesu. Wamamwikirirya n’omutima, Akandisyakulamya.

songLyric.verse1: Ka lyowene kundu-kundu, Wamikiriya Yesu. Wamikiriry’emibughe, Niyo Mulamya wetu.
songLyric.chorus: Yesu, Yesu namabyanza, Nabirikwanza kundu, Yesu, Yesu ka ni Mwira, Namakusima lino.
songLyric.verse2: Ka lyowene kundu-kundu, Wamaleka ebibi. Wamabana esyongebe, N’obutseme kwenene.
songLyric.verse3: Ka lyowene kundu-kundu, Wamaminya Ye Kristo. Wamaminya kwasikala, Haghuma netu eno.

songLyric.verse1: Natsemire kiro ekyo, Nikiriray’Omulamya. Mwanyilusya kw’amalolo, Mwanyerya kw’ebibi byosi.
songLyric.chorus: Tutseme, tutseme, Yesu mwatwera kw’ebibi. Mwatukangya erisaba, N’eritsema biro byosi, Tutseme, tutseme, Yesu mwatwera kw’ebibi.
songLyric.verse2: Sihali ghundi Mulamya, Nina Yesu Iyo wene. Ni Mubuya, amatoka, Amalusya olubanza.
songLyric.verse3: Abiririha ebibi, Abirkind’oluholo. Mwalubuka omw’isinda, Abirikinda Sitani.

title: ABANZIRWE N’OMWAMI
englishTitle: Come We That Love The Lord

songLyric.verse1: Abanzirwa n’Omwami, Ni mwase tuyatule, Hosi eritsema lyetu, Tusumb’émirenge yetu, Tutimb’ékitumbi, Tutimb’ékitumbi.
songLyric.chorus: Tughend’e Sayuni, Omuyi owene kundu. Tughend’e Sayuni ko muy’owene wa Nyamuhnga.
songLyric.verse2: Tuleke abaponi, Bakaghana Omwami. Nikwa abana b’Omwami, Nikwa abana b’Omwami, Mubye mukasima, Mubye mukasima.
songLyric.verse3: Tutsemer’e Sayunu, Muyi abuyirire. Twasyahindana yo bosi, Twasyahindana yo bosi, Hasyaby’obuholo, Hasyaby’obuholo.

songLyric.verse1: Naghulw’omusasi w’Embuli, Monalam’omwighenyera, Lino ndi mwana wawe kundu, Nasyatula gho ehosi.
songLyric.chorus: Ndamibawe, n’omusasi wawe Yesu, Nyeraye, Nyeraye, Ndi mwana wawe kwenene.
songLyric.verse2: Nyipipe Yesu wanyilamya, Nyinemutsema kutsibu, Niwe kyakakala kibuya, Unzondol’ebiro byosi.
songLyric.verse3: Sinyibiriraw’Omulamya, Nyinemukulengekania, Sindiluha erimusima, Ngapipa olwanzo luwe.
songLyric.verse4: Nyasi ko nasyamulola ko, Nasyatsemera ewuwe, Akandinda ndeke ehosi, Mumusibire n’erimba.
songLyric.verse5: Ndi n’amaha kwambikire ho, Kakira omo lubula, Lero twasyabya naye kundu, N’abamwikirirye bosi.

title: TWASYAPOLYA KO AW’ENGEBE
englishTitle: We’ll Tarry By The Living Waters

songLyric.verse1: Twasyapolya oko w’engebe, Isoko nyibuya, Aho Yesu asyatulinda, Hindana lyowene.
songLyric.chorus: Twasyapolya oko w’engebe, Twasyapolya oko w’engebe. Twasyapolya oko w’engebe, Twasyasib’okw’isoko.
songLyric.verse2: Twamaluhibwa n’emibiri, Tuluhuke eyo, Ko maghetsi asongokwere, Kw’isoko nyibuya.
songLyric.verse3: Tughende k’Omukama Kristo, Atuh’érilama, Kandi tuminye kw’akalamya, Tunywe enyot’ihwe.

songLyric.verse1: Mughulu Yesu syahindany’Amami, Bahangan’embere siwe; Itwe twasyabya tuti omo mbanza, Kiro ky’eriyateghekwa.
songLyric.chorus: Asyahunik’engan’omo kighona, Neryo omusung’asyaghuswa. Itwe twasyabya tuti omo mbanza, Sy’ekiro ky’erilubuka.
songLyric.verse2: Ndindy’asyow’Omulamya abugh’ati: Uli mughombe mubuya, Kutse asyakwa buba abwirw’ambu: Lwa ho, ghenda sinyikwasi.
songLyric.verse3: Tuteghaye tulindiriry’Omwami, N’esiseke sinemwaka, Omukwe eghaye itunemuteya, Twe bosi abana buwe.

songLyric.verse1: Sindikwa engitsi y’efeza n’ezahabu, Nyanzir’eby’elubula, Nyibye n’ababuya. Yesu Mulamya mbwira: Ekitabu kiwe, Kundu ky’Obwami buwe: Nzakirwe mo kwehi?
songLyric.chorus: Nzakirwe mo kwehi, Kitabu Kibuya, Mo Kitabu ky’Obwami: Nzakirwe mo kwehi.
songLyric.verse2: Ebibiy’aswe Mwami, Bingi ko museghe, Asa, Mwami, Nyeraye mo musasi wawe. Wabirilaghana kw’ebibi byetu byosi, Byamasos’omunyama, Wasyeryabyo kundu.
songLyric.verse3: Omo Muyi Mubuya, N’enyumba nyibuya, N’ababuya bane mo, Bambity’obubuya. N’ebibi sibiri yo, By’eribihya eyo, Ho hali obuholo, Nzakirwe mo kwehi.

songLyric.verse1: Haly’olubanza binemutondolwa, Twasyayira tuti kwehi? Twahik’emuliro gh’Omutsweri, Aban’ebyo twakola byosi.
songLyric.chorus: Twasyayira tuty’ekirw’ekyo? Twasyayira tuty’ekirw’ekyo? Twasyabya tunemuteya kwehi? Kutse twasyakindwa n’ebibi?.
songLyric.verse2: Syabiritsuk’omo babirihola, Syasyasa n’omo bali  ho, Twasyaleberibw’omo Masako, Ayo ni mulangiri wetu.
songLyric.verse3: Twasyabugha tuti eky’omo mbanza, Ebitabu byasanzulwa; Mundu mundu abwiraw’ebiwe, Atawite omutongolya.

songLyric.verse1: Omwami akabirikira, Atuhindanaye n’abuwe; Asyatweya ituli tuti: Ahw’asyasira.
songLyric.chorus: Mwana wa Tata we Asa, Nikw’Omwamy’asyasa, Twasyayira tuti kwehi? Omwami asa.
songLyric.verse2: Twasyambalibwa asyombita, Omutongolya asingibwa, Twasyabya naye n’erikota, Ahw’asyasira.
songLyric.verse3: Ngokw’eripalya asyaswasa, Nikwa asyakangya ebyosi; Asyakangy’ebyosi twakola, Ahw’asyasira.
songLyric.verse4: Asyatsemer’Abana buwe, Bambal’embita yihenirye; Twamakinda twasyatsema yo, Ahw’asyasira.
songLyric.verse5: Sitwendisyasighana kandi, Abaghan’erimwowa bosi; Basyalaka n’erisyalira, Ahw’asyasira.
songLyric.verse6: Mwami tuli n’amaha wawe, Twighisy’erikulindirira; Sitwesyubaha twalangira, Kiro wasyasa.

songLyric.verse1: Biba omo ngyakya, Embuto syowene; Ubibe mwitungi hik’omwigholo. Lindirira syere, N”erighesa lyahwa, Twasyatsema kundu, Tune n’engano.
songLyric.chorus: Mulety’engano, Mulety’engano, Twasyatsema kundu, Tune n’engano Mulety’engano, Mulety’engano, Twasyatsema kundu, Tune n’engano.
songLyric.verse2: Bib’eryuba ryasa, Biba n’omo mbeho, Susagh’ekilumbi n’embeho nyingi. Erighesa ryahwa, n’emibiri yahwa, Twasyatsema kundu, Tune n’engano.
songLyric.verse3: Twende tukalira, Tubibiry’Omwami; Twamabya n’obulighe bw’abahera. Kiro twasyakiranibwa n’Omukama, Twasyatsema kundu, Tune n’engano.

songLyric.verse1: Omulenge gh’Omulisya, Akabirikira Eka; Kw’esyombuli syaherire, Mo buhyo ni ho syalwire.
songLyric.chorus: Ni mwase, ni mwase, Tusisonday’omo musitu, Ni mwase, ni mwase, Tusisubaye ku Yesu.
songLyric.verse2: Tutabale Omulisya, Tusondaye esyatere, Tusisubay’omo buhyo, Ho syangabalir’émbeho.
songLyric.verse3: Syamamir’omo  musitu, Syamahika omo ngwangwa; Omwamy’akababwir’ati: Musond’esyombuli syaghe.

songLyric.verse1: Lamya ab’ebibi, lamy’abakoni ; Balusy’obulighe n’oluholo. Habul’abatere, Sumb’abawire, Babwire ko Yesu akalamya.
songLyric.chorus: Lamya ab’ebibi, lamy’abakoni Yesu Mughenyeri, Akalamya.
songLyric.verse2: Bamusekererya, Syalibaghana, Akalinda abatabuke. Bakune batsire, Ubasabire; Mo malighe asyababuyira.
songLyric.verse3: Kung’abaherire, Munasesene ; Balek’engumbu y’ebitowene; Basule olwanzo, Bakole ndeke, Basub’oko Muhangiki wabo.

title: INGYE NYANZIRE ENGULU
englishTitle: I Love To Tell The Story

songLyric.verse1: Ingye nyanzire Engulu, Yo ya Yesu Mukama; Eritula omwatsi, ghoyo wahol’oko muti. Ghoyo waly’omwisinda, Ghoyo kandisyahika, N’eritutwal’ewuwe, Aherihenia.
songLyric.chorus: Ingye nangatula gho, oko bihanda byosi, Olwanzo lwa Yesu Kristo, Mwami Oyo wetu.
songLyric.verse2: Ingye nyanziry’omubiri, wa Yesu we Kalwari, Kusangwa mwanyilusya k’olubanza w’erihera. N’eririha ebibi, mwanyitongolya kundu, N’ekyo kyokyangatuma: Inamukolera.
songLyric.verse3: Ingye nyanzir’éritula, Omwatsi gho’omusasi ; N’esyodudy’omo byala, N’eritum’omo lukanga. Mobyaghaly’Omukama, Oyo Mubuyirire, Kusangwa atwanzire, Wasingy’oku Yesu.

songLyric.verse1: Neryo tulamaye abatere; Abatere hali ku Yesu. Tubahindule mo Ngulu Yiwe, Baminye k’Omwamy’abanzire.
songLyric.chorus: Tuye hosi (Tuye hosi) Tweghay’abandu bosi, Tuletere (Tuletere) Yesu baherire. Tuby’omo buhyo (Tuby’omo buhyo) By’Omulamya wetu Yesu wayiha oko b’ebibi.
songLyric.verse2: Tuletere Yesu abatere, Abolo bate n’akaghala. Bakangay’aho basyalamira, Baminye enzira y’Engebe.
songLyric.verse3: Tughende ngoko Yes(u) atutuma, Tubye tunemumukolera. Lamy’abakoni, Sumb’abawire, Sondol’abatere ku Yesu.

songLyric.verse1: Amalima erire ehosi ni ndambi y’erihulula, Lino ni ndambi y’erihulula Mukokoro n’oko bitwa.
songLyric.chorus: Mwami utume abaghesi tulame Mwami w’erikota, Batume bahindanay’amulo; Omughulu akine ho.
songLyric.verse2: Ubatume omo ngyakya-ngyakya, Utume bo n’omw’itungi, N’endambi y’eryuba n’erirenga, Bahamule bayaghese.
songLyric.verse3: Mughombe gh’Omwami, Yir’omuhwa hindanay’eby’erigheswa, Nerw’ekiro wasyabugh’ebyosi, Wasyatsemer’elubula.

songLyric.verse1: Tukole n’omuhwa, tukolere Yesu, Tughende tukolere Omwami wetu; Kinywa kiwe ky’okikatuh’akaghala, Tuyiry’omuhwa mungi twikiriraye.
songLyric.chorus: Tukole, tukole, tukole, tukole, Tuminye, tusike, tulindirire Omwami,
songLyric.verse2: Tukole n’omuhwa, lamy’abawirire, Sondol’abaluhire ah’erilama, N’erikangirirya Engulu Yowene, Tuyihalambire oko Musalaba.
songLyric.verse3: Tukole n’omuhwa, Tuyabwir’abosi, Ko amami wa hisi akandisyahwa, Kandi Omwami asyapipwa n’abosi, Ababuya basyimbira erilama.
songLyric.verse4: Tukole n’omuhwa, Omwamy’ase luba, Ekiro ky’erighesa kyamabihika. Tuy’elubula ew’ababirilama, Twasyabya n’erimba ko twabirilama.

title: KOL’OMUBIRI WAWE
englishTitle: Work For the Night Is Coming

songLyric.verse1: Kol’omubiri wawe, Bukinalolire; Kola hakin’ekimi, Subye mughata. Kola bukiri mw’itungu, S’uluhe na hake, Kol’omubiri wawe, Bugh’emibiri.
songLyric.verse2: Kol’omubiri wawe, Kola n’omw’itungi; Kola ebiro byosi, Sighuluhuke. Omo ndambi ukiriho, Uyitsingirire, Ukole bute bwira, Bugh’emibiri.
songLyric.verse3: Kol’omubiri wawe, Lino bulolire; Bukasonda erira, Tayira luba. Erihika n’omo kiro, Eryuba ryalenga, Uyitsing’erikola, Bugh’emibiri.

songLyric.verse1: Omo ngyakya nyinemwimba, Nyikupipe Mwami, Nguhe erisaba lyaghe, Mwami ngwikirirye.
songLyric.verse2: Mwami unzondole kundu, Mo nzira nyibuya, Unyiminyisay’obwenge, Miny’ebitolere.
songLyric.verse3: Bakakeng’Erina lyawe, Ubye ukowa bo, Ubaswike olukogho, Balamy’amalighe.

songLyric.verse1: Mwase tupipe Omwamo tuti: Erina lyawe rikengwe, Mwami ni We w’erihenia lyosi, Erina lyawe rikengwe.
songLyric.chorus: Mukeng’Erina,  Mukeng’Erina, Mukeng’Erina,ly’Omwami, Mukeng’Erina,  Mukeng’Erina, Mukeng’Erina,ly’Omwami.
songLyric.verse2: Yesu Rina, rikabugh’obuba, Mukeng’Erina ly’Omwami, Mweny’ebibi ngamukwama lino, Mukeng’Erina,ly’Omwami.
songLyric.verse3: Atulamya kaghala k’ebibi, Mukeng’Erina ly’Omwami, Omusasi wawe atulamya, Mukeng’Erina,ly’Omwami.
songLyric.verse4: Mulenge wuwe mubuya kundu, Mukeng’Erin ly’Omwami, Abandu bosi babughe bati : Mukeng’Erina ly’Omwami.
songLyric.verse5: Esyondimi syosi syimbe siti: Mukeng’Erina ly’Omwami, Yesu Kristo Yowatuholera, Mukeng’Erina,ly’Omwami.

songLyric.verse1: Tupipy’Omwami ni Mwenge, Tumupipa bandu bosi, Mumupipe Abalaika. Isse, Mwana n’Ekirumu. Amina
Nyipipire Nyamuhanga wahangik’ebitwa, Yowasesa esyongetsi, Mwahangik’ekyanya. Nyipipy’oyo wah’eryuba, Eryaka omwitungi, Yowahira omukera, N’engununu syosi.
songLyric.verse2: Mbipy’olukogho lw’Omwami, Wasulay’akalyo Mwahangik’omo kinyw’ekyo, Ebirihw’ebyosi. Eby’eriswekera byawe, Ngalangira ehosi, Hano hisi n’elubula, Esyo ndambi syosi.
songLyric.verse3: Sihali kike n’ekike, Kitetukangaya, Embula n’eryuba biry’okwitegheka lyawe. Ukah’ebiri h’omuka, Kand’ukatung’ebyosi, Situsaghe Nyamuhanga, Lero aly’ehosi.

songLyric.verse1: Tupipe Omwami w’ekihugho, Na kandi mwimbe, Tumusime Yesu. Akatulembera, Akatubika; Netu twamusaba, N’erih’ewasignya.
songLyric.verse2: Tubwir’abandu, Emyatsi yiwe, Sitwangaluha, Akaha akaghala. Iye ni Munene, Akatabala, Mwah’engebe Yiwe, Erilamy’abandu.
songLyric.verse3: Awity’amaka, Kwilab’abosi, Lwanzo lwa Yesu, Lwalet’obuholo. Abirituyira mo bana buwe ; Ng’abaghala buwe, Twangamukolera.

songLyric.verse1: Tata twas’ah’uli, Tutawity’oghundi, Niw’ukatulamya, Tutsumule, Twabya tutesiba, Tuly’omo malighe, Utuluhukaye, Tata Mwenge.
songLyric.chorus: Tata twas’ah’uli, S’utughane, Wasi erilamya, Towe lino.
songLyric.verse2: Tulusy’ekw’enzighu, Tulamy’obulighe, Utuhumulay’omo malighe, Situwity’amaka, Tusul’akaghala, Utuhe amak’imotwakinda.
songLyric.verse3: Tusule olwanzo, Tuby’abawe kundu, Tusondol’ewawe, Twase kuwe, Tubye nawe Mwami, Nomo twangahola, Sitwibirirawe tubye nawe.

songLyric.verse1: S’unyilabe ko Mulamya, We ngayitsutsa, Wamalenderer’abandi, Naghe s’unzighe.
songLyric.chorus: Uwe Mulamya, We ngayitsutsa, Wamalenderer’abandi, Naghe s’unzighe.
songLyric.verse2: Mbye hakuhi nawe Mwami, Mban’ighenyera, Namakukwama ngenyere, Mb’erikirirya.
songLyric.verse3: Sihali ghundi Mulamya, Niwe wowene, Ndamy’ebihutale byaghe, Unyighenyere.
songLyric.verse4: Ul’Isoko y’obuholo, Mwenye engebe, Singwity’oghundi Mulamya, Ni nawe Yesu.

songLyric.verse1: Ndambi mbuya y’erisaba, Ikanyilusy’omo malighe; Mbu nyasy’aho Tata ali, Nyimubwire obwera bwaghe. Mo syo ndambi sy’obulighe, Nasungire akaghala, Ngind’eryaghalwa ly’enzighu, Mo ndambi mbuya y’erisaba.
songLyric.verse2: Ndambi mbuya y’erisaba, Ukalay’erisaba lyaghe; Omwami syalihemuka, Akatulinda tutsumulwe. Namayiha kwiye lino, Nikwa yowambirikira, Nyine n’amaha w’ewuwe, Nyipip’endambi y’erisaba.
songLyric.verse3: Ndambi mbuya y’erisaba, Ubye ukanyihumulaya; Nikwa nasyahik’ewetu, Nasyahuluka omo bitu. Mba bw’isimi n’ababuya, N’eyo ngebe y’erikota, Aho ni ho nasyalagha, Endambi mbuya y’erisaba.

songLyric.verse1: Ebiro ndatu byamahwa, Yindi Sabato yatsuka, Nzemire eriluhuka, Mo kiro kyatsumulaa.
songLyric.verse2: Mwase tupipe Omwami, Yowatuh’eriluhuka, Omuyisa w’ekirw’ekyo, Alabir’eyindi yosi.
songLyric.verse3: Tutsemiry’omo mitima, Twitsingir’eby’elubula, Mo buluhukiro bwetu, Ko Mwami Mwenye Sabato.
songLyric.verse4: Eryombomba ry’elubula, Ritusule itwe bosi, Hosi Kanisa y’Omwami, Ikind’esyongumbu nyibi.

title: YITSINGE, USABE
englishTitle: Watch for The Time Is Short

songLyric.verse1: Sighuluhe omughul’ono, Teghaya ni muhindo, Teya sukindwe n’ebya hisi, Mukristo usabe. Wasy’omubiri ni molo! Kandy’enzighw’ikalire, Ulindiriry’Omuheruki, Teghaya sighumbaye.
songLyric.chorus: Yitsinge Usabe, Yitsinge Usabe, Uyiteghay’omwitungi n’omo kiro: Sighumbay’erisaba.
songLyric.verse2: Higha ebikakulenga ko, Lek’emitima mingi, Wasyaluhukir’elubula, Ho wasyombombera. Uby’ukasba Mukristo, Omwami akwanzire, Ibuka kw’akuholera, Bamulusy’omusasi.
songLyric.verse3: Sighumbay’erisaba Yesu, Bya Naye ndambi syosi, S’umwibirirawe na hake, Lindirir’Omwami. S’ulind’isyatitimbira, Lek’eritika-tika, Ni ndambi y’érimulinda, Sighumbay’erisaba.

songLyric.verse1: Wibuke Sabato, Omwami atsumula, Ni kikul’omo bindi, Kilabir’ebyosi. Tukaluhuk’emibiri, Twabwirw’eby’elubula, Ni luseke lukaka, Lwalwa ku Nyamuhanga.
songLyric.chorus: Utuletery’obuholo, Sabato mbuya kundu, Utuletery’obuholo Sabato mbuya.
songLyric.verse2: Weraye Sabato, Kandi upip’Omwami, Wabwir’abaghomby’ati: Ingye Ndi “Engebe”, Twamayibombeka lino, Tukolery’Omulamya, Twasyatwaly’okw’isoko, Y’amaghetsi w’engebe.
songLyric.verse3: Tutsemire kundu, Tunemwimbira Yesu, Mwira Wetu Mubuya, Tumuyiketere. Mulamya wetu Mubuya, Erighenyera ryawe, Indi haghuma nenyu, Rikamba Omuyisa.

title: KIRO KY’ERILUHUKA
englishTitle: O Day Of Rest And Gladness

songLyric.verse1: Kiro kyowene ky’eriluhuka, Kyatsumulawa ky’obuholo. Kikasubaya utakalire, Kyowene omo bindi byosi, Mwami mo kiro kyawe, Abosi bakupipe, Tupipe lino kundu, Ni w’erikota n’erikota.
songLyric.verse2: Ni kisokero kitesendaya, Sikiribya mo emighumba, Kiri ng’éririma eryowene, Esyonyusi sya ho syowene. Ni maghetsi w’amuhu, Omoghulu w’embeho Ni ho tukabanira, Ekihugho eky’endaghane.
songLyric.verse3: Ni kiro kikalet’omuyisa, N’erituletera Olwanzo, Kyokikalek’itwatsir’ebyosi, Erikwama eby’elubula. Kiro ky’erighenyera, Kiro eki kibuya Tusond’eriluhuka, N’omo ngonde sy’omo lubula.

songLyric.verse1: Erihindana lye Sabato, Erigh’ekinywa kiwe, Erihindana ribuya kundu, Likanzemesaya.
songLyric.chorus: Hindana lye Sabato, Hindana lye Sabato, Nyanzire ry’omo mutima waghe, Hindana lye Sabato.
songLyric.verse2: Omutima waghe atsemire, Erimuminya kundu, Kikanyisondola omo ngebe, Hindana lye Sabato.
songLyric.verse3: Hindan’eryo Yesu atsumula, Kandi mwanyibuyira, Omulenge wuwe ogh’olwanzo, Hindana lye Sabato.

songLyric.verse1: Biro ndatu byahwere, Twabwirawa n’Omwami; Tusonde Omuyisa, Mo Kisabiro kyawe. Ni kiro kilabire, Kyanyibuky’elubula, Ni kiro kilabire, Kyanyibuky’elubula.
songLyric.verse2: Tukasab’omuyisa, Mo rina ry’Omulamya, Tubughire ebibi, Utughenyere kundu. Tuleke ebya hisi, Itwaluhuka nawe, Tuleke ebya hisi, Uluhukire omw’itwe.
songLyric.verse3: Twamas’erikupipa, Iwas’itwasangana, Tukweghaye Mulamya, Mo Kisabiro kyawe. Mwami tuhe muyisa, Bibuya by’elubula, Mwami tuhe muyisa, Oko byasyaby’elubula.
songLyric.verse4: Engulu yawe mbuya, Ikalamya ababi, Erighenyera lyawe, Likatulekeraya. Tuhe erikusima, Twanze Sabato yawe, Tuhe erikusima, Tubye nawe biro byosi.

songLyric.verse1: Twamakukokya kandi, Ebiro by’obutseme, Mweyo wakabukaya, Kyakakala ky’endata.
songLyric.verse2: Butseme bwawe kundu, Ibwatsemesy’omweyo, Bahumuly’obulighe, N’eribugh’olughendo.
songLyric.verse3: Kiro kibuyirire, Ky’eripip’omwisaba, Na atuminyisaye, Muyisa wawe mungi.
songLyric.verse4: Twamakukokya kandi, Kiro ky’eriluhuka, Wase n’amaka wawe, Omo mutima waghe.

songLyric.verse1: Motow’Engulu Mbuya, Ko Yesu alamya, Tsungania obutseme, Ko Yesu alamya. Bibwir’abandu bosi, Usoke n’esyonyusi, Omwamy’ati ya hosi, Ni Yesu alamya.
songLyric.verse2: Tsungania n’oko ngesti, Ko Yesu alamya, Ubwire ab’ebibi, Ko Yesu alamya. Tsungania n’ebitsira, Kw’Engulu Yowene nga, Yasyowibwa ehosi, Ko Yesu alamya.
songLyric.verse3: N’omo malwiro muti : Ni Yesu alamya, Mwatutongolya itwe, Ni Yesu alamya. Abalwere mwimbire, Basonde Omulamya, Mwimbiry’oko masinda, Ko Yesu alamya.
songLyric.verse4: Amahung’abugh’ati: Ni Yesu alamya, Bandu bosi basime, Ko Yesu alamya. Sumb’omulenge uti, Mwase bosi mulame, Tupipe Ow’Amaka, Ko Yesu alamya.

title: NYIKWANZIRE WE MULAMYA
englishTitle: I Must Have The Saviour With Me

songLyric.verse1: Nyikwanzire we Mulamya, Sinangayighendera, Nyikwanzire mbye hakuhi, Unyihe n’akaghala.
songLyric.chorus: Sinangubah’ekindu,Umbwir’ebyo wanzire, Sihali kyangagha h’uli: Ngukwamirir’ehosi.
songLyric.verse2: Nyikwanzire we Mulamya, Ko ndi molo kutsibu, Ni Nawe ukanzikaya, Singwite no oghundi.
songLyric.verse3: Nyikwanzire we Mulamya, Aho ndi mo kihugho, Mo mulumbi n’oko ryuba, N’omo malighe ghosi.
songLyric.verse4: Nyikwanzire we Mulamya, Mbwire eby’ekwenene, Ungolay’oko Yordani, Umbe n’erisoka yo!

title: NAMIBUK'OMUSALABA
englishTitle: When I Survey The Wondrous Cross

songLyric.verse1: Namibuk'omusalaba w'eriswekya, Omwami w'erihenia mwahola kugho. Esyondundi syaghe, Sindiswibuka syo kandi N'ebyongayipipa mo kundu.
songLyric.verse2: Lebay'esyongolu syo mubiri waghe, Sikandeter'obulighe n'obutseme. Akandy'obulighe n'obutseme byahindana Hali akakira k'amahwa.
songLyric.verse3: Nabya nabiritala nyiring'ekyusa, Neryo nabirilama omo malihge. Sunzighanaye sinyiyipip'omo kindi, Nikwa omusalaba wawe.
songLyric.verse4: Naho ebyabumbawa byabya ebyaghe, Sinangabana ekyo nakulenga ko. N'olwanzo n'obwenge bwalwa elubula, Bikaleka inasigh'ebyosi.

title: ITWE TWAMABAN’OMWIRA
englishTitle: What A Friend We Have In Jesus

songLyric.verse1: Itwe twamabon’Omwira, Yesu Kristo Mulamya, Mwaheka ebibi byatu, Amatuh’obutseme. Twangamusab’akaghala, Asy’amalighe wetu, Ni Mulamya Mwenge kundu, Yesu Kristo ni Mwira.
songLyric.verse2: Twabya tuli n’omulighe, N’enzir’eyikalire, Yesu akanditulamya, N’akaghala kanene. Sitwangaluha na hake, Akandituwatikya, Tumusabe biro byosi, Yesu Kristo ni Mwira.
songLyric.verse3: Sitani akatutebya, Na tukakwa endwala, Yesu syangatwibirirwa, Tumusabe kwenene. Yesu mwakinda Sitani, Netu twangakinda yo, Tusikay’Omwami wetu, Yesu Kristo ni Mwira.
songLyric.verse4: Mwami mwakola kibuya, Mwatum’Omwana wuwe, Ritulamya kwe Sitani, Yesu Kristo ni Mwira. Twasyasoker’ewa Tata, Ahate n’obulighe, Tumutwalire abandu, bangabya Bana buwe.

songLyric.verse1: Yesu Kristo akabirikira, Wase lino, wase lino, Neryo sughend’omo yindi nzira, Wase ukwame Yesu.
songLyric.chorus: Wase kwiye, wase kweiye, Yesu akabirikira uhike kwiye.
songLyric.verse2: Abaluhire basyaluhuka, Wase lino, wase lino, Ab’emiheke yiritohire, Baban’eriluhuka.
songLyric.verse3: Anemulinda abandu bosi, Base lino, Base lino, We wahalaya sighuyibise, Wase ulamibawe.
songLyric.verse4: Yesu akalind’abakaghana, Base lino, base lino, Basyatsema bamamwikirirya, Babuka luba, base!

songLyric.verse1: Omo lukyo l’omweyo, Mugheni (Anahangene), Anahangene aho, Mugheni (Anahangene). Neryo umukokaye, Ukokaye Omwana Wa Tata ogh’olwanzo, Mugheni (Umukokaye).
songLyric.verse2: Mweyo wawe k’Omwami, Kingula (Mukingilire), Isyakusigha hali, Kingula (Mukingilire). Risakana n’Omwira, Asyahumuly’omweyo, Naye Asyakuteya, Kingula (Mukingilire).
songLyric.verse3: Nery’owa omulenge, gh’Omwami (‘Wa omulenge), Uyisinge emyatsi, Y’Omwami (Myatsi y’Omwami). Ukingule oluyi, S’umubwire ‘Iyihi’, Rina riwe ribuya, Y’Omwami (Rina ly’Omwami).
songLyric.verse4: Kingula omutima, K’Omwami (Mukingilire), Wasyahabw’obutoki, B’Omwami (Buteya Bwetu), Asyamba obubuya, Asyalusya ebibi, Wamakingul’omweyo, K’Omwami (Mukingulire).

songLyric.verse1: Hali yo wasa ku Yesu mo kiro, Amubulya by’enzira y’erilama: Yesu mwamusubirya kweneny’ati: Kundu ngakubwira.
songLyric.chorus: Ubutawe akandi, Ubutawe akandi, Kwenene, kwenene ngakubwira, Ubutawe kandi (Kundu).
songLyric.verse2: Nenyu mwamakwa ekinywa kiwe, Ngoko Yesu abugha kyo kwenene, Nabyo byakubera muyisa neryo, Wasyalama kundu.
songLyric.verse3: Abanzir’obuluhukiro bosi, N’erisyimba yo n’abasyalamibwa, Wasonda engebe ey’erikota, Wikirirye lino.

songLyric.verse1: Unyitabe nyinemukulirira, Wase Mulamya waghe, Mutima waghe akulindirire, Wase Mulamya waghe.
songLyric.chorus: Namabitala haly’oko mwahge, Namabitala ingy’owene, Unyihekery’ewawe lino Mwami, Wase Mulamya waghe.
songLyric.verse2: Sihali aho nangaluhukira, Wase Mulamya waghe, Umby’eritsema haghuma n’engebe, Wase Mulamya waghe.
songLyric.verse3: Namaluh’enzira ni nyiri kundu, Wase Mulamya waghe, Ameso waghe akulindirire, Wase Mulamya waghe.
songLyric.verse4: Mwami namasa, sighunyihemule, Wase Mulamya waghe, Wowe, Omulamy’ekiriro kyaghe, Wase Mulamya waghe.

songLyric.verse1: Angatok’erilamya, Mo byakakol’ebyosi; Angatok’erilamya, Abakamowa. Inyamulusy’omo muliro, Yesu katok’erilamya abamwanzire.
songLyric.chorus: Angatok’erilamya, n’erikulamya lino, Mulikyetu wamakwama, Asyakulamya.
songLyric.verse2: Angatok’erilamya, Nikwa ni kindu kwehi? Anawite amaka w’erikulamya. Mbwire ebyosi mbwire, nikwa Kristo bita, Angatok’erimbohola n’erinyilamya.
songLyric.verse3: Angatok’erilamya, Mughendi y’uluhire; Wamakwama Yesu iniasyakulamya. Sighusaghe Sitani, Uyanzire Yesu, Leka eritika-tika, Uyiketere.

songLyric.verse1: Twasyahimb’endata w’eribwe, Yesu Ribwe rya kera; Twasyasika omw’ubahisya, Kanyabungu kabuha.
songLyric.chorus: Twasyahimb’edanta (Twasyahimb’endata w’Eribwe Rinene), Twasyahimb’edanta (Twasyahimb’endata w’Eribwe Rinene), Twasyahimb’endata w’eribwe, Endata wa Yesu.
songLyric.verse2: Abandi bakahimb’oko museghe, Ow’ekihugho kino, Abandi mwisi gh’olututu, Lw’eritsem’omo bibi.
songLyric.verse3: Himba naw’endata w’Eribwe, Kibanza kiwe kyowene, Kyokyasyabamo obuholo, Haghuma n’erilamibwa.

title: UNYIBWIRE EBYA YESU
englishTitle: Tell Me The Story Of Jesus

songLyric.verse1: Unyibwire ebya Yesu, Ebisihire kundu, Biwite enzwere nene, Bikanyitsemesaya. Neryo balaika bangi, mobamwimbira kera, Kamwaleta obuholo, Oko bandu ab’ekihugo.
songLyric.chorus: Unyibwire ebya Yesu, Saka by’oko mutima, Biwite enzwere nene, Bikanyitsemesaya.
songLyric.verse2: Neryo ngoko bamuboha, Mo mbwarar’iyo wene, Neryo kamwakinda kundu, Ritebya rya Sitani. Omubiri owakola, N’ebiro by’obulighe, Neryo kamo bamwaghalya, Ebyosi niby’eriswekera.
songLyric.verse3: Omwatsi gh’omusalaba, Mobamubamba kugho, Neryo ngoko mobamuta, Kamwakind’eyisinda. Righenyera liwe ringi, Olwanzo luwe kwingye, Kamwatek’engebe yiwe, Nyihabawe erilama.

songLyric.verse1: Omulisya Mwanze akakubirikira, Omo kibungo kiwe, Ho haly’obuholo Kasonda abakali, Balume, Balwana, Yesu akasond’abo, Ibasa okwiye.
songLyric.chorus: Kabugh’omo mweyo gh’olukogho, Oyo waherire ase kwengye, Neryo ngakulinda alindire, Mwami Yesu Muslisya.
songLyric.verse2: Kamwateka eribya ho busana netu, Asond’abaherire, Base kwiye lino. Twasyayitsingirir’ewuwe n’obuholo, Obw’eribirikira, Omulisya wetu.
songLyric.verse3: Situlindirire kandy’enzighu Sitani, Ni soro eyo moli, Ikasyatuherya. Yesu yu katusonda, Omulamya wetu, Twingir’omo kibungo, Ho hali omwanya.

songLyric.verse1: Omutsweri asyaby’asa, Asombola ebyetu; Tukasyabya ng’ezahabu, Kutse nga mataleyo.
songLyric.chorus: Nahirirw’oko lulengo, Lino syoswire, Nahirirw’omo kinyw’ekyo, Lino syoswire.
songLyric.verse2: Nikwa twasyow’abugh’ati: Kundu namabasima, Kutsy’olubanza lw’eribohwa, Namey’isyoswire.
songLyric.verse3: Neryo twitaby’omulenge, Endambi yikiri ho, Tulek’eriyighanyira, Itwayilebya kundu.

songLyric.verse1: Wamow’ebinywa byo Mulamya, Kabyobikah’engebe ; Uwe munyabibi, Minya ko hane bakabik’emighambo.
songLyric.chorus: Bane ho abasyabike yosi, Bobatsemire,obatsema, Bane ho abasyabike yosi.Bakatsema, bakatsema.
songLyric.verse2: Eryowa lisa, simuli ki, Nakakiribawa kundu, Twamow’itubaha, sitwangalama, Basyatsema basyow’eyosi.
songLyric.verse3: Basyingira omo butseme, Mo muyi wa Nyamuhanga, Ahate obulighe n’eryaghalwa, Bahik’oko muti w’engebe.

songLyric.verse1: Sihaly’omwir’oyuli nga Yesu, Sihali, sihali ; Oyo wangalamya omutima, Sihali, sihali.
songLyric.chorus: Yesu asy’amalighe wetu, Biro byosi akasondola, Sihaly’omwir’oyulinga Yesu: Sihali, Sihali.
songLyric.verse2: Sihali endambi ate netu, Sihali, sihali ; Mwirimya syangatughaba kwiye, Sihali, sihali.
songLyric.verse3: Sihali oy’ulingene naye, Sihali, sihali ; Oyo wangatulusya kw’ebibi, Sihali, sihali.
songLyric.verse4: Syangabanik’oghundi Mulamya, Sihali, sihali ; Iye muta omusasi wuwe, Sihali, sihali.

songLyric.verse1: Unyisamaliry’akatubwira, Yesu Yo watuholera ; Mo musalaba muly’engebe, Aho hanasyaban’ekighona.
songLyric.chorus: Samalir’e Kalwari, Samalir’e Kalwari, Nasyahabw’eribya ho, Nasamalir’omuti (W’e  Kalwari).
songLyric.verse2: Namalengwa k’omw’ibulikira, Enzighu syamanyitegha, Namalebya oko musalaba, Maka nasyabana gh’oko Mwami.
songLyric.verse3: Nasamalira Omusalaba, Buli ughulu kwenene, Ndaghane nasyayiketera, Neryo kwenene sinangaluha.

songLyric.verse1: Yesu kabirikir’omo mbolere, Kasonda uwe naghe; Mo mweyo wetu kalinda riteya, Akakulinda uwe.
songLyric.chorus: Mwase kwingye, Abaluhire mwase, Yesu kabirikir’omo mbolere : Kasonde wase kwingye.
songLyric.verse2: Akatusabira s’ulindirire, Anemutusabira, Isiwapon’obwenge n’olukogho, Lukogho luwe kwitwe.
songLyric.verse3: Biro byeribya ho byalaba luba, byalaba kuwe naghe, Mwirimya asa, luholo lukasa, Lwasa kuwe no kwingye.
songLyric.verse4: Ghanyira busana n’olwanzo luwe, Olwanzo kuwe, kwingye, Bibi byetu abiritubuyira, Ribuyirwa ni ryetu.

songLyric.verse1: Omo lukyo olubuya, Luyi lukingukere ; Yesu abiri ki ngula, Na silwangasyakingwa.
songLyric.chorus: Lunakinguker’okwingye, Lwamalekwa luty’okwingye, Kwingye, kwingye: Lutya, Luty’okwingye.
songLyric.verse2: Luyi lunakingukere, Bandu balamibawe, Oko bera na bateke, Omo bihanda byosi.
songLyric.verse3: Ukwamirire oluyi, Lukinakingukere, Uyising’omusalaba, Yo ndundi ey’olwanzo.
songLyric.verse4: Musalaba wasyaheka, Biro byosi butseme, Lwanzo lwa Yesu ni lungi, Tukamukukamira.

songLyric.verse1: Mukumu Munene oyo, Yesu mweny’erilama ; Akaleta obutseme, Yesu, Mulamya wetu.
songLyric.chorus: Balaika bosi mwimbe, Tupipe Omwami wetu, Rina riwe ribuya, Ni rya Yesu Mwami.
songLyric.verse2: Mupipe Mwana w’Embuli, Mupipe Omulamya, Malolo ghosi n’ebibi, Akalusay’aghosi.
songLyric.verse3: Sihali erindi rina, Litoler’eripipwa, Kutse eritutsemesya, Kasiryangabanika.
songLyric.verse4: Naye akandisyaswasa, N’olukengerwa luwe, Tukasyatsema na kera, Rikal’ewuwe, Mwami.

songLyric.verse1: Wasond’ebindu s’uli, N’endambi ku Yesu? Mo mibiri mibuya, S’uli n’endambi kwiye Butseme bw’ekihugho, N’emyatsi y’obutseme, Ebyo ukasondaya, S’uli n’endambi kwiye.
songLyric.chorus: Myats’ikutimbire ko, Kwiye s’uli n’endambi? Wanyewa n’ekihugho, Kwiye s’uli n’endambi? Takingula oluyi, Akahumanga lino, Endamby’akakusonda, Kwiye s’uli n’endambi?
songLyric.verse2: Endambi y’enzwere, Kwiye mute n’omujbiri ? Mwitsingirire okwiye mute n’ommubiri? Uwe iwayitsemesya, N’eby’omo kihugho kino, S’uwite ndambi y’eri-kwamirir’ebya Yesu.
songLyric.verse3: Uli bikoma bisa, S’uli mbuto sya Yesu? Ebyala biri busa, S’uli mbuto sya Yesu? S’uwite kyo wasyakangya, Ekiro asyaswasa, S’uli no obutseme, Walangira Omwami?

title: NAMASEGHERA, MULAMYA
englishTitle: I Am Coming To The Cross

songLyric.verse1: Namabirikirwa, N’omulenge wawe ; Nyeribaw’omo musasi, Wawe ughutika.
songLyric.chorus: Namasegher’oko Musalaba, Nyeribawe kwenene, Mo musasi wawe.
songLyric.verse2: Ingye molo kundu, Mowamb’akaghala, Wabirinyerya kw’ebibi, Nyikulindirire.
songLyric.verse3: Yesu yo wanyanza, Omo Lwanzo lungi, Butseme, buholo kundu, Byasyaby’elubula.
songLyric.verse4: Ukaha amaka, Omubiri wawe, Unyeray’omo musasi, Wawe oghutika.
songLyric.verse5: Nabirilamibwa, Lwanzo n’olukogho, Kuwe Mwami ngwity’amaka, N’eritunganene.

songLyric.verse1: Yesu asi amaka wawe ni buyira ; Teghaya Omw’isaba, Uhabaw’omuyisa.
songLyric.chorus: Yesu mwaliha, Lubanza lwaghe, Ebibi byabya bingi, Naye mwery’ebyosi.
songLyric.verse2: Mwami, namalangira, Akaghala kawe, Weraye emitima, Tuyire mo babuya.
songLyric.verse3: Singwite kindi kindu, Ekyanganyilamya, Nasyer’omo musasi, Gh’Omulamiya Oyo.
songLyric.verse4: Nasyaghend’omo bitu, Haghuma n’Omwami, Nambala akakira, Nyikukamire Yesu.

songLyric.verse1: Eririba ly’omusasi, Wa Yesu  katwerya ; Kamwaghalibwa, Asonda tubane engebe.
songLyric.chorus: Ririba ly’omusasi, Namingira nyeribawe, Mwami nyeribawe kundu, akeraya, akeraya.
songLyric.verse2: Musasy’akabugha kwingye, Monow’omulenge, Akabugha, Mweyo waghe, Ineribwa mugho.
songLyric.verse3: Ngahangana inaghenda, Omw’ihenia liwe, Emyenda yamabyeribwa, Mutima ni Yesu.
songLyric.verse4: Lukogho lw’eriswekera, Lukeray’emwisi, Ka nyiri na Yesu musa, Oyo y’Omulamya.

songLyric.verse1: Tata singwity’Omulamya, Ni nawe wowene ; Neryo kwingye wamabiswa, Nyikole ki Tata?
songLyric.chorus: Sesene namikirirya, Yesu Yo wahola, Yowut’omusasi wuwe, Nyilwe omo bibi.
songLyric.verse2: Nyikiriry’Omwana wawe, Umb’amaka wawe, Unyusulaye omuhwa, Oko ndambi eyi.
songLyric.verse3: Ni butseme bungi kwingye, Rilol’oko busu, Nyiminy’omulenge wuwe, Nyiban’olukogho.

title: NGANDIMB’OLWANZO LUWE
englishTitle: I Will Sing Of Jesus’ Love

songLyric.verse1: Ngandimba (Ngandimba), Lwanzo luwe, Lwanzo lwa (Lwanzo lwa) Yesu Mwami, Busana (Busana) kayowalwa, Okw’Ise, mwahola.
songLyric.chorus: Ngandimba (Ngandimba) Lwanzo luwe, Ripipa (Ripipa) nasyateka, Mwahola (Mwahola) ka nyibye ho: Ngandimb’olwanzo luwe.
songLyric.verse2: Misonia (Misonia) kamwaliha, Nomo nde (Nomo nde) sindirira, Risaba (Risaba) siriri ho, Akanyisabira.
songLyric.verse3: Olwanzo (Olwanzo) lungi olo; Kihugho (Kihugho) sikyasi lo, Buyira (Buyira) abab’ebibi, Ebingi ng’ebyaghe.
songLyric.verse4: Sihali (Sihali) ebibuya, Ebyona (Ebyona) Birikola; Ngasonda (Ngasonda) tsuka lino, Nyikangay’olwanzo.

songLyric.verse1: Hakuhi nawe, nyiseghere, Hakuhi nawe ho nangikala ; Mwami nyanzire, Ungwate ko, Undeghaye sinangalwa kuwe, Undeghaye sinangalwa kuwe.
songLyric.verse2: Hakuhi kundu, sindi naki, Sindi n’esadaka, Mwami Yesu. Mutima waghy’amabya mubi, Weraye gh’omo musasi wawe. Weraye gh’omo musasi wawe.
songLyric.verse3: Hakuhi kundu, Uwe naghe, Nasyatsemer’erirek’ebibi, Matseme ghosi n’eripona, Umber’itsira byo kundu Yesu. Umber’itsira byo kundu Yesu.
songLyric.verse4: Hakuhi kundu, n’oko nduli, N’omo lubula nasyahangana, Ebiro ebyosi nyine yo, Nasyalola oko busu bwawe. Nasyalola oko busu bwawe.

songLyric.verse1: Haly’erina ly’eriswekya, Rilabir’awandi ghosi ; Nery’Omwami watuhangika, Na Mughala anyanzire.
songLyric.chorus: Ni rina ribuya, (Erina), Ni rina ribuya, Ryalwa ku Nyamuhanga ryasa hisi. Neryo rikimbawa (Erina), n’Abamalaika (Kwenene) Erin’eryo ni rya Yesu.
songLyric.verse2: Neryo rikamb’omuyisa, Nyanzire eripipa ryo, Sindyumbay’eripipa ryo, Ngabwira obuli mundu.
songLyric.verse3: Ekyangamba n’erisyimba, N’Abamalaika buwe, Nasyabya ngapip’erina, Rilabir’awandi ghosi.

songLyric.verse1: Yesu musa y’utoler’eripipwa ; Nikwa ingye sindi kindu kundu. Sinyitolere ingye riyipipa, Yesu musa, Yowanganahulwa.
songLyric.verse2: Yesu musa y’ukabugh’obulighe ; Nikwa ingye unyiwatikaye. Sinangakolera ebyanganduhya Nikwa Yesu kay’unatolere.
songLyric.verse3: Yesu musa Yo wanganahalambwa; Sinyitolere eriyipipa. Yesu musa, asyanyibanika mo, Erisyahika eribya nga Ye.
songLyric.verse4: Yesu musa y’ukabugha obwera ; Niye musa ngah’ebyagh’ebyosi. Yesu musa, yukandeter’ebyosi, Yesu musa, nyiyibere nawe.

songLyric.verse1: Oko kitwa kuli henia, Erihenia ly’eryuba ; Mo malima n’omo ngetsi, N’eryuba rihenirye. Erihenia ni rinene, Omo mutima waghe, Kusangw’aho Yesu ali, Hali ekyakakala.
songLyric.chorus: Ekyakakala kibuya, Kiri omo mutima, Aho Mwami Yesu ali, Hali ekyakakala.
songLyric.verse2: Ng’esyongimba ngulukulu, Ngalusay’obulighe, Omwenda ogh’obutseme, Watoler’eryambalwa. Ngakukwam’omo mutima, N’omo nyumba y’endata, Eyasitikawa ndeke, Mwisi gh’olwanzo luwe.
songLyric.verse3: Yesu wanyitongolaya, Ndi wawe lino Mwami, Byosi ni byawe Mulamya, Biro byosi ngupipe. Ngakukwam’omo mutima, N’omo nyumba y’endata, Eyasitikawa ndeke, Mwisi gh’olwanzo luwe.

songLyric.verse1: Nyine n’olwimbo lubuya, Olw’abikirirye ; Lo Mulamya Nyamuhanga, Olw’abikirirye.
songLyric.chorus: Olw’abikirirye, Olw’abikirirye Rina riwe ripipwe Olw’abikirirye, Ngandisyapip’erina  riwe.
songLyric.verse2: Kristo atolere kundu, Olw’abikirirye ; Risonde riwe nyanzire, Olw’abikirirye.
songLyric.verse3: Nyinemutula gho kundu, Olw’abikirirye ; Rikahigh’itikatika, Olw’abikirirye.
songLyric.verse4: Ndi n’obwikalo bubuya, Olw’abikirirye ; Nyine haghuma na Yesu, Olw’abikirirye.

songLyric.verse1: Nyamuhang’asy’esyonyunyu esikatoghonga ; Amanzatya esyonyunyu, Naghe anyanzire.
songLyric.chorus: Anyanzire, anyanzire, anyanzire kundu, Nyinasi kwanyanzire, Ingye nyiri muke.
songLyric.verse2: Mubatsi mubuya akasitik’obusoyo, Amanzatya obusoyo, Atya anyanzire.
songLyric.verse3: Nyamuhanga wahangik’ensyonyunyu, busoyo, Syangibirirwa abana, Kundu anzire bo.

songLyric.verse1: Ndambi mbuy’erisaba, Twamabiyikehya ; Neryo twamasa kwiye Yesu, y’Omwira. Tuwity’erikirya, Kw’ali Omuteya, Abaluhire kundu, Akasyaluhukya bo.
songLyric.chorus: Ndambi ’isaba, eyeritsema ho Abaluhire kundu, Akasyaluhukya bo..
songLyric.verse2: Ndambi mbuy’erisaba, Amas’Omulamya ; Lyowene iniowa abana buwe. Katubwira tuhire, Mo maghulu wuwe, Miheke yetu yosi, Imo twasyatsema yo.
songLyric.verse3: Ndambi mbuy’erisaba, Bangatok’eryasa ; K’Omwami Yesu Abakalengawa ko. Mweyo wuwe mubuya, Asyababuyira, Abaluhire kundu, Akasyaluhukya bo.
songLyric.verse4: Ndambi mbuy’erisaba, Tukandisyahabwa ; Miyisa y’omutima, Twamikirirya. Twamikirirya kundu, Sitwendisyubaha, Abaluhire kundu, Akasyaluhukya bo.

songLyric.verse1: Wabiritugha neryo babiri, Basaty’oko rina ryawe bamasa ; Wasyatsumula bo, na munabwire, Twamakukwama omo nyumba yawe.
songLyric.chorus: Yesu was’ewetu, Ututsumule, Yesu was’ewetu, Ubye hakuhi.
songLyric.verse2: Wabiribya netu, mo bindi biro, Tunemukulinda, nery’utwasire, Wase Omulamya, tuhy’olukogho, Utowe Yesu na ututsumule.
songLyric.verse3: Wase utabal’emirenge yetu, Mo nyimbo n’omwisaba, bihamule; Kirirya rikanye, riminyikale, Lwanzo lubye lubuy’enzira mbuya.

songLyric.verse1: Ndi wawe Mwami ngow’omulenge, Unemubugha naghe, Kwenene, kundu, ngasonde kuwe, Nyisik’eryas’ey’uli.
songLyric.chorus: Mwami nyase (nyase), Nyase hakuhi, Kundu kuwe k’omuti? Mwami nyase (nyase), Nyase hakuhi K’omusasi w’enzwere.
songLyric.verse2: Nyihire lino, nyikukolere, Mo maka gh’olukogho, Ebyo wanzire naghe nanze byo, Nyisik’erikukwama.
songLyric.verse3: Nyiri n’obutseme buli ndambi, (I)nyinemukania nawe, Ngo yukakanaya no omwira, Inyinakukamire.

songLyric.verse1: Nangakusosa kundu, Yesu Mulamya waghe, Umb’erikola ndele, Mba lwanzo lw’eriswekera. Nangakusosa kwenene, Aho ngaya ehosi, Namayikehya kundu, Mwami nyikukwamirire.
songLyric.verse2: Inyatey’ekihungu, Kamiya kisukali, Sinangubaha kundu, Nyinasi ko nyine nawe. Wasyayisy’eriteya, Unyibuyire obubi, Namayikehya kundu, Mwami nyikukwamirire.
songLyric.verse3: Nangakusosa kundu, Ngukwame biro byosi, Mbire hakuhi nawe, Ahatehwa obuholo. Ukambindula mo muhya, Busana n’olwanzo lwawe, Namayikehya kundu, Mwami nyikukwamirire.

songLyric.verse1: Musalaba wa Yesu, Nyikale hakuhi Eyo hali isoko, Yangalamy’ebibi.
songLyric.chorus: Hali musalaba, Musalaba wuwe, Oyo n’ipipa ryaghe, Omwibyaho lyosi.
songLyric.verse2: Hakuhi musalaba, Monatitimana, Lwanzo molwandangira, Molwanyibuyira.
songLyric.verse3: Unyibuke Mulamya, Ngulangire eyo, Nyiban’olwanzo lwawe, n’erikurwa nalo.
songLyric.verse4: Hakuhi, Musalaba, Nyimuyiketere, Riteya n’eririnda, Nasyikala eyo.

songLyric.verse1: Nyirendere nawe Mwami, Ngo kwalendera Henoki, Ungwaty’okuboko kwaghe, Ubughe naghy’omo mbolere, Nomo ndalangire enzira Yesu nyirendere nawa.
songLyric.verse2: Sinangatoka tute nawe, Haly’ebisund’elubula, Bitegho bighonye by’enzighu, Syonzighu nyingi sin’omo nzira Uhumulaye n’engetsi Yesu nyirendere nawe.
songLyric.verse3: Unyiwaty’oko kuboko, Amatseme kwingye n’italya, Mo maka nyinemughenda Tuhekire omusalaba, Tway’omo muyi Sayuni Yesu nyirendere nawe.

songLyric.verse1: Ekyangamba erimba ngapipa Omwami waghe, Nikwa nindi wangatok’erimba eripipwa rya Yesu.
songLyric.chorus: Olwanzo, lw’eriswekera, Olwanzo lwa Yesu, Olwanzo lw’eriswekera, Olwanzo lwa Yesu.
songLyric.verse2: Ka yona butseme bwaghe, Ka yukanamb’obuholo, Mo bulighe n’omwaghalwa, Yesu yu kanambumulaya.
songLyric.verse3: Yonaye ngayiketera, Erisyahabwa engebe, M’omwirimy’inyakolerya, Yesu yukanambumulaya.

songLyric.verse1: Nyikwanzire, Mwami Yesu kwilaba ebyosi, Kusang’ukanzemesaya, Ni mbolere Mwami.
songLyric.chorus: Kinywa kyawe kyangatulwa (Kyatulwa), Eky’olwanzo lwawe, Kinywa kyawe kyangatulwa (Kyatulwa), Musasy’akeraya (Keraya).
songLyric.verse2: Nyikwasi uli hakuhi, kwilab’ekihugho; Erikwibuka lyowene, Kwilaba erimba.
songLyric.verse3: Kundu unyitsemesaye, Naghe nasyatsema, Namabya nyite n’olwanzo, Lwawe, ni buyira.
songLyric.verse4: Byasyabya biti Mulamya, Erikala nawe, Nikw’omo kihugho kino, Tunatsemire kwehi?

songLyric.verse1: Ahw’asyanzondola hose, Honasyatsemer’eriya, Kusangwa ingy’aholera, Mwangwira ate n’ekibi.
songLyric.chorus: Yesu kanzondola kundu, Nahik’ewuwe buholo, Kwali Yo Mwira nyanzire, Syali atambemukira.
songLyric.verse2: Ngatsemer’eribya naye, Ngatsemer’erinzondola ; Ngatsemera erimowa, Kusangwa ingy’aholera.
songLyric.verse3: Sinditikatika kundu, Ko ndi haghuma na Yesu, Nyinayiketere kundu, N asyamulolako Mwami.

songLyric.verse1: Kihugho sinyanzir’ekyo, Ngasond’Omwami Yesu, Kihugho kikanyitebya, Yesu abuyirire.
songLyric.chorus: Lukogho ni lw’eriswekya, Lwanzo lute lulengo, Erilama eryoswire, Tubikirwe engebe.
songLyric.verse2: Kihugho sinyanzir’ekyo, Ngasond’Omwami Yesu, Mo bulighe bungi Iye, Ni lwimbo olubuya.
songLyric.verse3: Kihugho sinyanzir’ekyo, Ngasond’Omwami Yesu, Mo lughendo lw’ekihugho, Kayo butseme bwaghe.
songLyric.verse4: Kihugho sinyanzir’ekyo, Ngasond’Omwami Yesu, Musalaba nyikirirye, Ngasyalola ku Yesu.

songLyric.verse1: Twala engebe yaghe, Bisabo by’obutumbya, Twala ndambi sy’ekiro, Isyakupipa eyo.
songLyric.chorus: Nyeray’omo mumsasi wawe (Nyere kundu), Unyeraye kw’ebibi byosi (Nyere kundu), Ebyagh’ebyosi, Nyikutekere byo Lino n’endambi syosi.
songLyric.verse2: Twala ebyala nabyo, bikole eby’ukanza, Twala bisando byaghe, Mo busondoli bwawe.
songLyric.verse3: Twal’omulenge waghe, Nyimbire Nyamuhanga, Twala n’eminywa yaghe, Yusul’ekinywa kyawe.
songLyric.verse4: Twal’ezahabu nibya, N’ebyosi by’ekihugho, Twala n’amenge waghe, Ukole ko wanzire.
songLyric.verse5: N’erighanirya Mwami, Siryangabya eryaghe, Twala mweyo ni wawe, Abye bwikalo bwawe.
songLyric.verse6: Twal’erisonda ryaghe, Pipa ry’omweyo waghe, Twala kundu mutima, Nyibye wawe kwilaba.

songLyric.verse1: Nyiwite Omwira naye, Oyo wanyanza kera, Lukoba l’olwanzo luwe, Nabohirwe na kera. Akakur’omweyo waghe, Alek’eribinduka, Nyiniker’emwisi wuwe, Ali naghe na kera.
songLyric.verse2: Nyiwite Omwira Iye, Oyo wanyiholera, Muta omusasi wuwe, oko bandu abose. Ingye singwite ki kandi, Nomo nangabya nabyo, Niby’ebyosi inabwekwa, Ngye ndi wuwe na kera.
songLyric.verse3: Nyiwite Omwira naye, Mwahabwa obutoki, Asyanyiteya iyowene, Asyanyitwal’endata. Namasamalir’ewuwe, Ngabya n’amaka kundu, Lino ngakolera ahisi, Nyum’endata na kera.
songLyric.verse4: Nyiwite Omwira naye, Ali n’omweyo mwenge, Ni Muhani, ni Musondoli, Muteya w’ekwenene. Nindi yo wanganyighaban’Omwanze ow’embere, Kwiye ngayikakiraya, Ngye ndi wuwe na kera.

songLyric.verse1: Yesu Yo wambirikira, Wase mo butseme, Mutwe waghe aghotsere, Mo kikuba kyaghe. Monaghenda yali luba, Kundu monaluha, Yo wamba neryo buholo, N’obutseme kundu.
songLyric.verse2: Yesu Yo wambirikira, Wase kwingye unywe, Maghesti w’engebe busa, Unywe kandy’ubye ho. Monaghenda yali luba, Maghetsi monanywa, Nyiri ho kwiye n’enyota, Kayahwere kundu.
songLyric.verse3: Yesu Yo wambirikira, Kihugho mwirimya, Wamalebya kyakakala, Kyamakukolerya. Monaghenda yali luba, Iye ryuba ryaghe, Mo buli endambi yaghe, Mo lughendo lwaghe.

songLyric.verse1: Mwami bye wawe, namabugha, Ngukwame, ngukwame, Ngole by’ukanza, Mwami waghe, Ungwatikaye.
songLyric.chorus: Mbye wawe (Mwami), Mbye wawe (Mwami), Eryo risonda lyaghe Mbye wawe (Mwami), Mbye wawe (Mwami), Mbye wawe Mwami lino.
songLyric.verse2: Ebya hisi sinzomene byo, Neryo nyibye nawe, Byosi nyighambawe byo kundu, Ndi wawe nawe.
songLyric.verse3: Nikwa obutsema bwa hisi, Wase tubye nawe, Ebinywa byo bikanzemesya, Bimbumulaye.

title: KIRO EKI KY’E SABATO
englishTitle: How Sweet Upon This Sacred Day

songLyric.verse1: Kiro eki kye Sabato, Kiro ky’eribuka, Kya Nyaluhanga w’endata, Rirek’ekihugho.
songLyric.verse2: Twangow’ekinywa kibuya, Rilw’oko Muhani, Rituhana, ribinduka, Tubane engebe.
songLyric.verse3: Nery’omo malwa n’ebibi, Nikwa twamakindwa, In’asyatuh’akaghala, Oyo wasy’omweyo.

songLyric.verse1: Twamabuka, tutsumule, Utuhe eritsema, Tubye n’olwanzo lwawe, Lukogho lw’erikinda, Nawe utuhumulaye, Tunemughenda ahisi.
songLyric.verse2: Tukakupipa n’ewasingya, Omo kinywa ky’Engulu, Bighuma biwe rilama, Byabanika okwitwe, Endambi yosi tuminye, Ekinywa kyawe Yesu.
songLyric.verse3: Biro byetu tulina byo, Tuyiteke ku Yesu, Tubye n’amaka, mo mweyo, Situluh’omo nzira; Hotwasyaloler’oko lukengerwa (o)lo Mukama.

songLyric.verse1: Ndim’olughendo lw’endata, Biro byosi ngahetuka, Ngasab’inyinemughenda, Mwami unyisondolere.
songLyric.chorus: Mwami unyisumb’endate, Ngwikiriray’elubula, Ndata kwilab’ekihugho, Mwami unyisondolere.
songLyric.verse2: Mweyo waghe kasyanzire, Rikala ahaly’obubi, Abandi banziry’ahisi, Risonda lyaghe n’iruka.
songLyric.verse3: Ngasond’eriruk’endata, Sinyikindawe n’enzighu, Mw’ikirirya ngandisyowa, Mirenge y’abasyakinda.
songLyric.verse4: Iruk’endata ngasonda, Inalola okw’ihenia, N’oko nduli nasyasaba, Mwami unyisondolere.

songLyric.verse1: S’ughan’erikol’omubiri w’Omwami, Yiteghekerania, Ughende ukole. Eyo Nyamuhanga kasond’ikutuma, Iwasyatsema yo mo mubiri wuwe.
songLyric.chorus: Ngasonda, wase sighughane, Ngasonda, ukoly’omibiri. S’ughan’erikol’omubiri w’Omwami Kwenene, kwenene, S’ukahiw’ewuwe.
songLyric.verse2: S’ughan’erikol’omubiri w’Omwami, Unemukola ki? Ukoly’omubiri. Righesa lyamera, Abake baghesa, Kangay’obutseme, Mw’ikoler’Omwami.
songLyric.verse3: S’ughan’erikol’omubiri w’Omwami, Erighan’olwanzo, Kuwe ni buhanya. Ndambi y’olukogho, Yesu akasaba, Ikangay’ebibi, Bihw’omo lubula.

songLyric.verse1: Tabal’emwisi waghe, Uwe Yesu Mwami, Ubye kwing’isubirya, Okwibulya lyaghe. Ubye ho mwisi waghe, Uwe Musondoli, Ubukobe ni bwaghe, Bwawe ry’erihenia.
songLyric.verse2: Ngatek’ekisabiro, Wabiribirya kyo, Linw’erihenia lyawe, Lyakolery’emwisi. Kihugho ikyahuna, Omubiri abye; Omukobe mubuya, Ow’erikusikya.
songLyric.verse3: Bitsuko by’omubiri, Byosi byakulinda, Byasond’ibyaghenda, Ibiman’erikola. Hate eriyitonga, kutse eripona, Kutse eryendererya, Hat’eriyihania.
songLyric.verse4: Nyibye oyuhehere, Sinyiyire luba, Nyisike inalinda, Ebihano byawe. Tabal’emwisi waghe, Uwe Yesu Mwami, Ubye kwingy’isubirya, Mo mabulyo ghosi.

songLyric.verse1: Unyirete hakuhi Tata, Unyibaghalire, Nyisegheray’oko kikuba, Ngasond’ilihuka.
songLyric.chorus: Unyirete hakuhi, (Nyase, unyirete hakuhi), Mo muliki w’olwanzo, (Muliki w’olwanzo). Unyirete (mo muliki w’olwanzo, unyirete hakuhi) Hakuhi nawe (Unyirete hakuhi).
songLyric.verse2: Unyirete Mulamya waghe, isitwaghabana, Ebyala byawe biri kwingye, Lino ndangire byo.
songLyric.verse3: Unyirete m’omweyo wawe, Nyisosane nawe, Unyeraye, nyiluhukaye, Mbye mubuya kundu.

songLyric.verse1: Ehosi na Yesu nyinemutsema, Eyakandwala Yesu ni butseme. Amabya ateho, sihatolere, Amabya ho Yesu Sinangubaha.
songLyric.chorus: Ehosi, Ehosi, Sinangubaha, Ehosi na Yesu naghenda naye.
songLyric.verse2: Amabya ho Yesu sind’ingyowewe, Nomo nangaghanwa, Nomo ndi muke. Mwanganyisondol’omo nzira nyibi; Namabya na Yesu nasyamupipa.
songLyric.verse3: Amabya ho Yesu mo nangaya to, Natok’eriluhuk’omw’ilubuka. Nyuma nasyaghend’ewuwe na kera, Amabya ho Yesu, Butsema kundu.

songLyric.verse1: Mwira ulabe omo mwisi, Neryo sutime-time, Omuka mubuya w’endata, Akusondolere.
songLyric.chorus: S na A : Ghender’omo mwisi, Ghender’omo mwisi, Ghender’omo mwisi, Mwisi mubuya wa Yesu. T na B: Ghender’omo w’eriswekera wa Yesu, Ghender’omo w’eriswekera wa Yesu, Ghender’omo w’eriswekera wa Yesu, Omo w’akaka wa Yesu.
songLyric.verse2: Ghender’omo mwisi mubuya, Omo kinywa ky’Omwami, Asyakusondola na kera, Asyakolera ho.
songLyric.verse3: Ughender’omo kyakakala, Ubye ukamukwama, Koleraya omo mwirimya, Hosi hahenaye.
songLyric.verse4: Ghendera omo kyakakala, ‘Miny’olwanzo lwa Yesu, No kwanza abali ahisi, Neryo mwalamya bo.

songLyric.verse1: Nikwa abaghesi bali hayi? Baghesere abatunganene, Bakengete kund’omo mitemi, Neryo ka sibabye abaghata!
songLyric.chorus: Kwa abaghesi, bali hayi? Babye haghuma netu tuyaghese, Neryo tutseme tune nabo, Erighesa ryasabya ryahwa.
