songLyric.verse2: Musondere omo miyi yosi, Lutswamba lwamaleng’oko ngano, Musisonde neryo sine mulo, Syosi imwasighesera Yesu.
songLyric.verse3: Lebaya amalim’amabyera, Abosi balindir’erighesa, Nikwa abaghesi ka ni bake, Omubiri linw’akabasonda.
songLyric.verse4: Inywe bandu mwimay’emitemi, Mughese endambi yikiri ho, Mubye n’omuhwa Omwamy’akasa, Lebaya amalet’ebihembo.

songLyric.verse1: Lino ngibuka ekihugho kibuya, Kyongasonda erilola ko, Nasyahangana hakuhi n’Omulamya, Mbita hasyaby’esyongununu.
songLyric.chorus: Sinyasy’embita yaghe ng’esyongununu, Syasyaheny’oko buli ndambi. Ngandisyabya nabuka omo syongonde, Hasyabya ngununu ko mbita.
songLyric.verse2: Mo maka w’Omwami nyikole mubiri, Nyiret’emitima y’abandu, Neryo nyibye n’esyongununu ko mbita, Mwami akatuh’ebihembo.
songLyric.verse3: Nasyabya n’obutseme namulola ko, Naleta emuliro wuwe, Bandu balamibawa busana n’omubiri waghe n’Omuka wuwe.

songLyric.verse1: Yesu bugh’omo mweyo, Bugh’omo mbolere, Bugha kwingye mo lwanzo, S’undek’ingyowene.
songLyric.chorus: Buli kiro, ubughe, Uty’omo mbolere, Nyombomber’embolere, Mbolere y’olwanzo. Biro byosi wakinda, Bwiranda ni bwawe, Neryo nyowe ebinywa, S’undek’ingyowene.
songLyric.verse2: Bugha n’abana Bawe, Kangaya b’enzira, Busule obutseme, Baminy’erisaba.
songLyric.verse3: Neryo bugh’emigambo, Ngoko wateka yo, Ibuyirire kundu, Mighambo yowene.

songLyric.verse1: Omwisona ery’engyakya, Sindisaba, Wayiteya sinyikole bibi lino. Sinyibughe kinywa kibi, Mutongolya, N’erighanirya obubi, Lino, nyitya.
songLyric.verse2: Nangakola omubiri, Ng’erisaba, Nangabere mundu omubuya kundu. Risonda ryawe nyikole, Rikusikya, Mubiri aby’obuhere, Lino, nyitya.
songLyric.verse3: Neryo lino namahola, Mw’ikanuka, Nyiyiketer’endaghane, syawe Mwami. Omw’isonda ery’engyakya, Sindisaba, Unyisondole, ‘nyibike, lino, nyitya.

songLyric.verse1: Unyibwire we Muteya, Bwasesukere kwehi? Erihenia ry’e Sayuni, Haly’ebiminyikalo? We mughendi uhangane, Usayire elubula, Iwambala n’omo mbindi, Ni musakala lino.
songLyric.verse2: Muteya takoleraya, Omo syonzira syawe , Biminyikalo byasyasa, Kw’ekiro ni hakuhi. Ngubi ikandisyabugha, Yasyabuky’abaholire, Babuyirire b’Omwami, Bahabw’obutahola.
songLyric.verse3: Muteya lebaya ndek’erihenia ry’e Sabato, Emireng’ikatula gho, Obwami ni hakuhi. Omughendi namalebya, Ekitwa ky’e Sayuni, Muyi w’e Yerusalema, N’erihenia rya mugho.
songLyric.verse4: Aho Nyamuhang’ikere, Ni muyi w’ezahabu Omo kitumbi kibuya, Oyo Yu katabala. Haly’obuholo ehosi, Amalima akabogha, N’ekitaka kiboghire, Syonyusi syowene nga.
songLyric.verse5: Muteya tuli hakuhi, N’ekihugho kyowene, Tughende yo m’obutseme, Kihugho ky’obuholo. Neryo mowe haly’olwimbo, Olw’ababirilamibwa, Tughende tuyahindane, N’endeko nene eyo.

title: NASYABYA AHO UKASONDA
englishTitle: I’ll Go Where You Want Me To Go

songLyric.verse1: Mbino sim’om’obitwa, Aho wasyambirikirira Mbino isim’omo ngetsi, Kutse ahaly’amalwa. Neryo wamambirikira lino, N’enzira isinyasi yo, Mwam’inasubirya nyisikiry’eriya eyu kanyituma.
songLyric.chorus: Nasyaya ah’ukasonda, Mwami, Mo bitwa n’omo syongetsi, Nyighende, eyu kambirikira Nyikukwamy’ey’ukaya.
songLyric.verse2: Mbino lino hali ekinywa, kisihire ky’olwanzo, Neryo kyo Yesu akasonda, Nyitul’omo mbolere. Wamabya haghuma naghe, Mwami, Nyimusondesonde lino, Sindirek’eritwal’Engulu Yawe, Aho wasyandwal’ahosi.
songLyric.verse3: Aho twangakol’omubiri N’omwighes’amalima, Omubii nangamukolera, Yesu Mutongolya. Neryo namayiketera We, Kusangw’unanyanzire, Erisonda ryawe nasyakola lyo, Nyibye n’ebyo wanzire.

title: YIHI, EBINYWA EBIBI
englishTitle: Angry Words! Oh Let Them Never

songLyric.verse1: Yihi, ebinywa ebibi, Isibyalw’omo buno, Omutima mubuya n’esyondim’isisyatsanda.
songLyric.chorus: Nenyu mwanzane (Mwanzane), Kabugha Yesu (Mwanzane), Ng’erimbere ngokw’abiritwanza. Nenyu mwanzane (Mwanzane), Kabugha Yesu (Mwanzane), Abana baghe mwanzane.
songLyric.verse2: Lwanzo ni lubuyirire, N’obwira obubuya, Sibiheribawe busana n’eribugha nabi.
songLyric.verse3: Situbugh’omw’ihitana, Bikalet’obulighe, Lwanzo lwawe, we Mulamya, Utuhe erikinda.

songLyric.verse1: Mundu mwaghend’akalira, Mwahuluky’embuto mbuya, Nomw’angaluha syangumbya, ‘Niatsumulwa n’Omwami.
songLyric.chorus: Neryo kasinemukula, Imwalebya ko singana, Amalima, ghosy’erire, Ni ndambi y’erighesa.
songLyric.verse2: Ekimi kikalw’endata, Ni kyakakala kibuya, Kikalek’embuto yera, Mo lukogho l’Omwami.
songLyric.verse3: Bib’embuto sighumbaye, Suhahukay’omutima, Wamalangira syamera, Ughese omw’itsema.

songLyric.verse1: Erighesa ry’ahisi ryamahika, Yesu akabirikir’abaghesi, Lebay’amalima amer’ehosi, Mulete emitemi muyaghese.
songLyric.chorus:
S:        	 Mukole, luba, mubik’emighanda 		 Mukole, luba, Imwasa 
A.T.B: 	 Mukole luba mwase, imwasa,
 Muhunik’emighanda, imwasa.
Mukole luba mwase, imwasa, Imwasa luba.
songLyric.verse2: Ekirw’ekyo sihabye ukalira, Uyiteghaye omo ngyakya syosi, Emighulu yalabir’erihunga, Mukole luba mbula yite yawa.
songLyric.verse3: Lwanzo luli ng’eyisoko yityuma, Lukalwa elubul’oko Mutoki, Lo lukatulembera erikola, Ilwatusikya situbye baghata.

songLyric.verse1: Yesu nyinemukusonda, Indi mbumi n’omwera, Unyiwate oko byala, Kuwe ngaban’amaka
songLyric.chorus: Mukama buli ndambi, Yesu nyinemukusonda, Mukama buli ndambi, Ndaghaye buli ndambi.
songLyric.verse2: Unyambalaye emyenda, Yaghu y’amenge wawe, Myenda yaghe itsandire, Nyinemuyitsutsa We.
songLyric.verse3: Uwe wamanyisondola, Inaghenda buholo, Ghenda naghe biro byosi, W’enzira ey’engebe.
songLyric.verse4: Namahika oko ndambi, Eyaghe y’obulighe, Kutse ihali butseme, Ndeghaye buli ndambi.

songLyric.verse1: Kyangamb’eribya wawe, Yesu Mwami waghe, Namaghambw’eby’ahisi, Nyikukwamirire.
songLyric.chorus: Kyangamb’eribya wawe, Namayiteka kundu. Mbul’omughaso, ndi ki, ndi ki, Umbe eriminywa.
songLyric.verse2: Kyangamb’eribya wawe, Yesu Mwami waghe, Ngole ebyo wanzire, Nyibye ngakukenga.
songLyric.verse3: Kyangamb’eribya wawe, Yesu Mwami waghe, Mbighul’oko by’ahisi, Unyeraye kundu.
songLyric.verse4: Kyangamb’eribya wawe, Yesu Mwami waghe, Mbye wawe ngoko nyiri, Bindu sibingaghe.

songLyric.verse1: Namabiban'Omwira, Ow'enzwere nene, Ananyanzire kwenene, M'olwanzo olungi. Nasyabya haghuma naye, Ha eno sinyasi, Tunikere haghuma, Mwami naghe.
songLyric.verse2: Neryo namaswaghalwa, 'Waminya ko nyiri, Neryo nyiyiketere, Yo walaliraya. 'Rinyisondola mo nzira, Hali kyakakala, Tukaghenda haghuma, Mwami naghe.
songLyric.verse3: Ngamubwir'amalighe, N'obutseme bwaghe, N'ebikanyiluhay'eno, N'ebyangatsemesya. Akambamul'erikola, Ebinyitolere, Nyanzire iniakania, Mwami naghe.
songLyric.verse4: Anasy'ebyo ngasonda, Eriret'abandu, Ukamba omubiri, Inyine mutula gho. Nyiyatul'olwanzo luwe, Okuki mwahola, Tukahana haghuma, Mwami naghe.

songLyric.verse1: Mo nzir'akanyisondola, Yesu waghe Mulamya, Syendisyakehy'olukogho, Musondoli wa kera. Ni butsem'erimukwama, Mo kihugho kwenene, Nomo nangaluha kundu, Yukakol'ebibuya : Nomo nangaluha kundu, Yukakol'ebibuya.
songLyric.verse2: Mo nzir'akanyisondola, Akakehay'omwagha, Namalwala inandamya, N'omo nzal'inughuta. Nomo nangaluha kundu, Maka nomw'angakeha, Ribwe rin'embere syahge, Rikanyiluhukaya : Ribwe rin'embere syahge, Rikanyiluhukaya.
songLyric.verse3: Mo nzir'akanyisondola, Omo lwanzo lunene, Nduli asyanyihumulya, Uwe Tata w'endata. Nambalibw'obutahola, Nikala n'Omulamya, Nasyamuha eripipa, kundu y'Omusondoli : Nasyamuha eripipa, kundu y'Omusondoli.

songLyric.verse1: Yesu akabirikira, Nindi yo nagatuma, Erighesa ryamahika, Nindi yo wangaghesa. Ko mubiri akasonda, Akatek'ebihembo, Nindi yo wangasubirya, Nyine Mwami nyitume.
songLyric.verse2: Wamaby'ute wangaghenda, N'erisoka engetsi, Neryo hali ab'ebibi, Abatamwasi Yesu. Wamaby'uli n'esisoni, Ribugha nga Paulo, Watok'erikangirirya, Olwanzo l'Omulamya.
songLyric.verse3: Wamaby'isiwangatoka, 'Riteya oko luyi, Uwatikaye abandu mo nzira ey'engebe. Mw'isaba n'omo bihembo, Risaba riwatikya, Ngoko Aruni mwatalwik'amaboko wa Musa.
songLyric.verse4: Bandu baly'omo bulighe, Yesu akabasonda, S'ubughe omw'ikereta, Singwite omubiri. Utsemery'omubiry'oyo, Abirikuh'Omwami, Umusubiraya luba, Uti Mwami nyitume.

songLyric.verse1: Mo bisando byawe Yesu, Binywa biwe bibuya, Ahandu haly'obuholo, Nyibye ho biro byosi. Mo bisando byawe Yesu, Ngibuk'olwanzo lwawe, Ni obwenge buwe kwingye, Bukanyitsemesaya.
songLyric.verse2: Mo bisando byawe Yesu, Handu habuya kundu, Nangalek'ebibi byaghe, Haly'obuluhukiro. Mo bisando byawe Yesu, Aho ho ngasabira, Ngasung'amaka okwiye, Butseme n'olukogho.
songLyric.verse3: Unyitsumule Mulamya, Omo bisando byawe, Unzamalir'omo lwanzo, Ndole ko busu bwawe. Umbe Mwami rikuminya, Uminyikale kundu, Namikala n'Omulamya, Yo bulamiro bwaghe.

songLyric.verse1: Nyikwanzire Mwami, Wasi nyikwanzire, Nyikwanzire, Yesu, Okwilab'ebyosi. Nyikwanzire, Yesu, Nawe unasi, Emibiri yaghe, Iyakangania byo.
songLyric.verse2: Butseme, butseme, kundu butahulwa, Obutseme bwaghe, Sibwesombolawa. Naleby'obuteke, Obw'elubula, Asyangabira bo, omo bwenge buwe.
songLyric.verse3: Yesu, Mwami waghe, Ni w'ukamb'ebyosi, Eby'erilamibwa, Ne eby'erikota. Nyikupipe kundu, N'erikwimbira, Omo bwenge bwawe, 'Nyanziky'omutima.
songLyric.verse4: Nakusosekania ki Mulamya waghe, Utula n'obwenge, Ka sulibinduka! Neryo nyikupipe, Inakukenga, Omutima waghe, 'Sule mo butseme.

songLyric.verse1: Uwe Ribwe ry'engebe, Kuwe nasyasayira, Kera wabirihola, Busana n'olukogho. Nyilusaye kw'ebibi, Nyitok'ikind'enzighu.
songLyric.verse2: Emwisi w'emibiri, Sinangaberererya, Nangakola n'omuhwa, Ebibi sibirihwa. Niwe wangatulamya, Kw'ebibi byetu byosi.
songLyric.verse3: Muna kihugho kino, Sihali omulamo, Ikirirya ni rike, N'eriminya siriri. Ingye mundu w'ebibi, Ungwatikye nyilame.
songLyric.verse4: Nyinemulindirira, Ekiro wasyaswasa, Nasyayir'endata, N'eriyakulola ko. N'eribya n'obutseme, Omo mutima waghe.

songLyric.verse1: Kibanza kya kera, Inywe b'Omwami, Momwahirwa ewenyu mo kinywa kiwe. Niki kinene akabugh'Omwami, Rikirirya ryenyu, Neryo rikanye. Rikrirya ryenyu, Neryo rikanye.
songLyric.verse2: Wabwirwa soka maghestis w'ekiro Syonyusi syeritebya sisikanye. Ngandisyabya nawe 'nakutokesya, 'Malighe owakasa, syakubahaye. Malighe owakasa, syakubahaye.
songLyric.verse3: Ukandisyabala omo muliro, Nasyakuh'amaka inakuhemba. Suheribawe nikw'ebibi byawe, Syasyasighalira zahabu syawe. Syasyasighalira zahabu syawe.
songLyric.verse4: N'omundu oyo wayiketera ngye, 'Maka w'eriherya syangamubahya. Na hake enzighu simukole ki!, Ni ngandisyamuteya omo malighe. Ni ngandisyamuteya omo malighe.

songLyric.verse1: Mukama Mulisya, Sinyiri nzama, Kanzondola mo bulisiryo bwaghe. Akanyipolesy'amaghetsi owene, Akanyisubulaya namatala.
songLyric.verse2: Namalaba mo musya gh'oluholo, We Muteya waghe, singangubaha. Mutso wawe 'niatok'erinyiteya, Wamanyihumulya sindibula ki.
songLyric.verse3: N'omo bulighe, 'wases'obutara, N'olutehi lwaghe loswire kundu. Wamabihakaby'omutw'amaghuta, Naghe nasyaswakubulya ki kwehi?
songLyric.verse4: Neryo olukogho n'obubuya, Byanganyikwam'ebiro byosi. Naghe nasyikal'omo nyumba y'Omwami, Nahiko omo Bwami buwe b'olwanzo.

songLyric.verse1: Mwimaye Obwami kuki wayato, Hakuhi rilama ukayato. Ubuke, hangana, wambal'engabo, Yo luba kundu, ndambi yikalaba.
songLyric.verse2: Mwimaye Obwami kuk'iwalinda? Kuki sulimaya ebihembo?  Neryo ambala Omulamy'akasa, Ni luba mukokaye akahika.
songLyric.verse3: Ebihanda binene by'ekihugho, Binemulwa n'erisangulana. Isighubaha byahika, mwasima, Ebiminyikalo byasyahika.
songLyric.verse4: Samalira matseme w'ekihugho, Neryo ayo akalaba luba. Kundul'ebikoba bikubohire, Mwimaye Obwami, mwase luba.
songLyric.verse5: Sumb'omutwe, ulebaye embere, Nyamuhang'asyasa n'erihenia. Ryuba rikabanika omo bitwa, Mwimaye Obwami n'obutseme

songLyric.verse1: Muhangiki mwami, Bindu byosi byawe, Mon'omo bwenge bwawe inyinemutsumulwa, Mon'omo bwenge bwawe inyinemutsumulwa nawe.
songLyric.verse2: Uwe wahangika, ngayiketera We, Neryo singangayipip'obwenge bwawe bungi, Neryo singangayipipa obwenge bwawe bungi.
songLyric.verse3: Nasyakuha kyahi? Ebyosi ni byawe, Olwanz'ukanzondola mutima wa wasingya, Olwanz'ukanzondola mutima wa wasingya.
songLyric.verse4: Unyih'olukogho, nyibye n'obutoki, Eribya ho kuwe, Mwami, biro byaghe ni We, Eribya ho kuwe, Mwami, ebiro byaghe ni We.

songLyric.verse1: Kwe! Muteya k’oluhimbo, L’omuyi we Sayuni, Emyatsi yiwe y’ekiro? Engyakya ni hakuhi, Haly’ebiminyikalo eby’erikya? Haly’ebiminyikalo eby’erikya?
songLyric.verse2: Nery’omo lughendo lwetu, Twalebya eyisirya, Twaghotsera omo ngetsi, Kisokero sihali, Kundu, kundu, Twasyalol’oko Bwami, Kundu, kundu, Twasyalol’oko Bwami.
songLyric.verse3: Twasyaleby’ekyakakala, Engununu y’engyakya, Mbuya yihenirye kundu, Yakolery’elubula, Mutsemer’ilama liri hakuhi, Mutsemer’ilama liri hakuhi.
songLyric.verse4: Twasamalir’ekitsutsu, Eyisirya sihali, Tuy’ember’eyo yoluba, Twasyaleby’eyisirya, Mutseme mwimbe esyonyimbo syenyu, Mutseme mwimbe esyonyimbo syenyu.

songLyric.verse1: Mubuke abaghombe, Abandu b’Omwami, Muwaty’omo maboko, Engabo sya Yesu, Mo nzira y’erikinda, Twasondolwa na Yesu, Tubye n’omuhwa mungi, Imo twasyakinda.
songLyric.verse2: Engubi syamabugha, Mwase imwe bosi, Embita y’obuyingo, Ni bihembo byenyu. Enzighu syamakala, Muhangane n’erilwa, Mubye n’omuhwa mungi, Mukinde Sitani.
songLyric.verse3: Mubuke na muyalwe, Simutike-tike, Sihabye ukasiba, Tungerera Yesu, Muhek’ebyuma byenyu, By’amalwa : Rikirirya, Muhabwe erikinda, N’obutseme bungi.
songLyric.verse4: Mubuke kuba luba, Muyakwe kutsibu, Mwikiriray’erina, Riwe mwasyakinda, Neryo ebyuma byosi, Mubih’Omwami Yesu, Mwasyaban’obuholo, Ob’omo lubula.

songLyric.verse1: Ngasonda erikirirya, Rikirirya kundu, Rite mo ititimana, kindu kyosi, Ndambi y’eryaghalwa, Ndambi y’eryaghalwa.
songLyric.verse2: Erite yitong’omwisusumana bulighe, Neryo mo mighulu yo mwagha, Inikirirya Nyamuhanga, Nikirirya Nyamuhanga.
songLyric.verse3: Rikirirya ryakolerya, Neryo n’omo malwa, Siryeryubaha omwirimya, Kutse bulighe obw’enzala, Enzala n’eryaghalwa.
songLyric.verse4: Syalyubaha ekihugho, Eriponwa mukyo, Syangatoghibwa mw’itebya, n’amabehi, Bibi n’eryubahya, Ebibi n’eryubahya.
songLyric.verse5: Mwamy’umbe erikirirya, Nery’imo natoka, Erigherya muna kihugho kino, Erimya obutseme, Erimya obutseme.

songLyric.verse1: Obutseme buli oko basyaya yo, Akine ho mwirimya wa hisi, Byamusikya, inakinda ritebya ry’enzighu, Byamusikya, inakinda ritebya ry’enzighu.
songLyric.verse2: Ebyo byatwibukya by’obuluhukiro, Aho batunganene basyabya; Ibayibera n’Omwira obutaghabana, Ibayibera n’Omwira obutaghabana.
songLyric.verse3: Ni kihugho kite banika mo bibi, N’eritebya kasiryehika yo. Ho hali obutseme butesyahwa na kera, Ho hali obutseme butesyahwa na kera.
songLyric.verse4: Sihali oyo wasyabya akalira, Luholo silwesyahika yo, Esyondulani syaho basyabya ho na kera, Esyondulani syaho basyabya ho na kera.
songLyric.verse5: Kyangatuha ndambi yangahika luba, Twalangir’Omulamya akasa, Akatutwala omo kihugho ekibuya, Akatutwala omo kihugho ekibuya.

songLyric.verse1: Mulamya ka yo Muslisya, Utusondele lino, Ututwale bulisiryo, Himba ndek’ekitunga. Mwami Yesu iyowene, Yukasondola ghuwe, Mwami Yesu iyowene, Yukasondola ghuwe.
songLyric.verse2: Twe bana bawe ubye Omwira, uwe Muteya wetu, Buhyo bwawe teghaya bo, Situkole ebibi. Mwami Yesu towe lino, Twamasab’ibuyira, Mwami Yesu towe lino, Twamasab’ibuyira.
songLyric.verse3: Wabiritulagha nikwa wasyaligha abandu, Wasyaghenyera bo, Eriha b’olukogho. Mwami Yesu tukwanzire, Ribya bawe kwenene, Mwami Yesu tukwanzire, Ribya bawe kwenene.

songLyric.verse1: Rikirirya riri, Ery’enzwer’enene, Kwilab’eritsema lyosi lya muna kihugho.
songLyric.verse2: Syongununu mbuya sikakoleraya, Kw’itwe mughulu w’erihola w’erilubuka.
songLyric.verse3: Twamaghalwa mo mweyo buba, bulighe, Mulenge akatubwira: Mwami abanzire.
songLyric.verse4: Erilw’e Kalwari, mulengy’akabugha, Ngununu iyakolery’erikirirya ryetu.

songLyric.verse1: Mo Kihugho kibuya, Kiri m’omuyisa, Asyabya ho nakera, Sihali mwirimya.
songLyric.chorus: Sihali erira, sihali n’oluholo, Biro sibyendisyibukwa, Sihali mwirimya.
songLyric.verse2: N’esyonyusi ni lulu, Mo muyi mubuya, N’enzira ni zahabu, Sihali mwirimya.
songLyric.verse3: N’omo muyi mubuya, Sihaly’erikinga, N’olusi olw’engebe, Lunemusenda ho.
songLyric.verse4: Sihali sond’eryuba, Yesu yona ryuba, Yu kakoleray'ehosi, Sihali mwirimya.

songLyric.verse1: Eh mbino ni ndambi y’erisesukala, Maseghe w’eryub’iniahigh’omwirimya. Neryo akasyasa Yesu omw’ihenia, Akandisyakoky’abuwe.
songLyric.chorus: Byasyabya kiro ki Mwami, Mughulu twasyimba: Anemwasa, Mwami Yesu, Aleluya, Amen, Aleluya, Amen.
songLyric.verse2: Eh mbin’omw’itungi, eh mbin’omw’igholo, Eh bin’omo kati kanene, mwirimya, Asyahwa ho omw’ihenia, ery’asyasa; Akandisyakoky’abuwe.
songLyric.verse3: Butseme twamahabwa obuta hola, Buta syasunga oko ndwala, misonia. Erisyatwalw’omo bitu omw’ihenia; Akandisyasy’oko buwe.

songLyric.verse1: Wasyabya unemuteya Yesu, Asyasya, Wasyabya unemuteya Yesu, Asyasya, Lebay’akasa, Lebay’akasa, Uteghaye lebay’anemwasa.
songLyric.chorus: Masa, Omukwi amasa, amasa, Masa, Omukwi amasa, amasa, Masa, amasa, masa, Amasa, Uteghaye mas’Omwukwi masa.
songLyric.verse2: Mukokotay’esisek’amasa, amasa, Mukokotay’esisek’amasa, amasa, Amasa, amasa, masa, amasa, Uteghaye mas’Omwukwi masa.
songLyric.verse3: Mwase tuhindane nay’amasa, amasa, Mwase tuhindane nay’amasa, amasa, Amasa kundu, amasa kundu, Uteghaye mas’Omwukwi masa.
songLyric.verse4: Tumwimbire Aleluy’amasa, amasa, Tumwimbire Aleluy’amasa, amasa, Amasa kundu, amasa kundu, Tumwimbire Aleluy’amasa.

songLyric.verse1: Sitwasy’ekiro, Yesu akandisyasa, Nikw’omughulu ali hakuhi kundu. Biminyikalo byabirihik’ebyosi N’ekiro tutasi.
songLyric.chorus: Asyasa, tulinde tuteghaye, Asyasa, Aleluya, Aleluya, Asyasy’oko bitu, N’erihenia ery’Ise N’ekiro tutasi.
songLyric.verse2: Atunganania, Ekitabu ky’obwami, Bakaminyira omo eby’ekwenene Eryasa riwe, omo Baminyereri, N’ekiro tutatsi.
songLyric.verse3: Luseke lwetu, siluhumber’eryaka; Tukole lino, tulindiriry’Omwami. Tumupipire situbye ne eryumbya, N’ekiro tutasi.

songLyric.verse1: Sinyasi endambi asyasa, Mwitungi kutsy’omw’igholo, Mbino ndambi ey’erigholo, Mbinw’eryuba ryahuluka. Akatubwira tuteghaye, Twakay’esiseke syetu, Neryo amasa atweghaye, Tubye itukamulinda.
songLyric.chorus: Twamulinda ne (Riteya, tukakulinda uwe), Twamulinda ne (Riteya, tukakulinda), Twamulinda ne (Riteya, tukakulinda uwe), Twateya itwamulinda.
songLyric.verse2: Namibuk’olukogho luwe, Nzwere y’erilama lyetu, Mwasigha n’enyumba nyibuya, Asy’aholere ababi. Nyasi ko byasyamutsemesya, Neryo ng’itwe bandu buwe, Twamakangany’olwanzo lwetu, Tuby’itunamulindire.
songLyric.verse3: Yesu Mulamya Ekitagha, We wasi ko ngateghaya ; Erikulola ko lyowene, N’erisyakokibwa nawe. Wasa oko bandi abandu, Neryo ng’Omutsweri wabo, Kwingye wasyabya Omwir’oyo, Nateya n’erikulinda.

songLyric.verse1: Twamabihik’oko mughulu w’eryasa rya Yesu, Akasyahek’abandu buw’omo nyumba y’endata.
songLyric.chorus: Twalangir’amasalali w’eryuba Akahigh’omwirimya; Twalangir’amasalali w’eryuba N’erilubuka.
songLyric.verse2: Haghuma n’abalaika buwe, Mwami asyasa, Akandisyatwal’Ababuyirire, Butahola.
songLyric.verse3: Engulu inemutulw’ehosi, Oko bihanda; Omwami w’obuheruky’amasa, n’Engubi yiwe.
songLyric.verse4: Abanze abaghabana kera, Basyahindana; Misonia yabo ab’obulighe, Yasyasangulwa.

songLyric.verse1: Mwatsi mubuya, Oko babuya, Lebaya ngandisya luba kundu; Ubye embangi, omo butseme, Wasyahabwa akakira katehwa.
songLyric.chorus: Uteghay’erikirirya ryawe, Ekihugho kihya ikyasasya, Wase wingire omo butseme, Wasyahabwa akakira katehwa.
songLyric.verse2: Twasyateya itunemusaba, Akasyasa ng’omurahy’oko bandi; Tunasi Ye ngo kwali hakuhi, Nikwa sitwasy’ekiro nga ni kyahi.
songLyric.verse3: Tukayiketer’Ekinywa kiwe, Neryo kyo kikabugh’eryasa riwe; Rikirirya ryetu y’endaghane, Ko ngasyasa luba: Ubye Embangi.

songLyric.verse1: Butseme oko kihugho, Yesu akasyasa, Buli mweyo mwangirire, byabumbawa byosi bimbe. Byabumbawa bimbe, Byabumbawa bimbe, Byosi bimbe, Byabumbawa byosi bimbe.
songLyric.verse2: N’Omwami asyatabala, Bandu neryo bimbe, Miti n’ebitwa n’amabwe, Mwimbire butseme bungi. Mwimbire butseme, Mwimbire butseme, Mwimbire Omwami n’obutseme bungi.
songLyric.verse3: Akasyatabala ndeke, Akasyatuhana, Bandu bubuya buwe, Lwanzo lw’eriswekera kundu. Olwanzo lw’eriswekya, Olwanzo lw’eriswekya, Olwanzo lw’eriswekya, lwanzo luwe.

songLyric.verse1: Nikwa ko tukanabugha, Eby’ekihugho kibuya, Tukole bibuya byaho; Ribya yo ryasatuha ki? Tukahul’enzira ya ho, Sihakabir’ezahabu, Neryo twamuzunzikania, twahika yo twasyabya ho.
songLyric.verse2: Twabugha ko hasosire, Hat’ebibi n’oluholo, Kutse ritebya siriri, Twahika yo twasyabya ho. Tukabugha n’eby’olwanzo, N’esyokanzu syasyambalwa, Tukatsemera byo kundu, Ribya yo ryasatuha ki?
songLyric.verse3: Nyitimbirwe ko n’ebibi, Ndungananay’eriya yo; Neryo naghe nyiyowe mo, erisyabya yo kwenene. Neryo twasyalendera omo kihugho ky’obutseme, Haghuma n’Abalaika, na Yesu Mulamya wetu.

songLyric.verse1: Tata Mwenge twasubwire, erkulakira, Twamayikehya kundu, twayolobeka; Twitsutse eribuyirwa.
songLyric.verse2: Twamasa erikusima, Kowa watuteya kundu, Ubye ukatwibuka watutsumula; Iwasubuly’ah’uli.
songLyric.verse3: Ayi, twabere bahanya, Tuly’ab’erighanwa kundu, Neryo tukakita oko nzira yawe ; Neryo lino twamaswasa.
songLyric.verse4: Mwami w’emiyisa yosi, Ni nawe ukahitaya, Lebaya mo lukogho, Twamakughonga; Tusule n’Ekinywa kyawe.

songLyric.verse1: Nikwa nabya n’ebibi, Yesu mwanyitongolya, Mwanyutir’omusasi, Mwangul’omo luholo, Nasyabya naye kera, Ng’omutahi n’momuti.
songLyric.verse2: Ighenyera rya Yesu, Ryusulaya ekyanya, Siryangalengwa ko ki, Ryasyabya ho na kera; Niwe wanyibwira ryo, Ngye sinabya nyasi ryo.
songLyric.verse3: Nikwa nabya n’ebibi, Yesu ‘labire byosi, Anasy’obwera bwaghe, Andamy’omo malighe; Ndi omukobe wuwe, Sindyedi syaghalirwa.

songLyric.verse1: Situli n’omuy’omo kihugho, Tuli mukyo tuli abaghendi. Nikw’ekyo tukatsemera, Neryo tukasond’omuyi, Alabire obubuya.
songLyric.verse2: Situli n’omuy’omo kihugho, Tukaya ewetu elubula. Ye Sayuni itula ho, Muli kyakakala kundu, Kikakoleraya ndeke.
songLyric.verse3: Neryo tukadisyatsemera yo, Ahw’abaghendi basyaluhuka. Kyangamb’ebipupa lino, Ngaghuluka ngasyaya yo, Ngayibera nawe Mwami.
songLyric.verse4: Mutima waghe lek’erighanya, Lebay’endambi Mwami ambere. Nyo nyibuya, yo nyibuya, Naghe inayiketera, Rihik’okw’ibirikirwa.

songLyric.verse1: Yesu ni Mwami w’abami, Oyo abiritwanza, Twamaby’itwamikirirya, Tukandilama lino.
songLyric.chorus: Erina rya Yesu, Erina ly’Omulamya, Tumwanzi, biro byosi, Ni Mwami Mwenge wetu.
songLyric.verse2: Tuyire erina riwe, Mw’inene biro byosi, Ni erina ly’erilamya, Kumbe wamikirirya.
songLyric.verse3: Usaby’oko rina riwe, Wamabya n’obulighe; Akandikuh’obutseme, N’akaghala kanene.

songLyric.verse1: Yesu Mulamya w’ekwenene, Akamb’obutseme n’obuholo, Nyihabaw’erilama riwe, Nyeribw’omo musasi wuwe.
songLyric.chorus: Omwatsi oyo lwimbo lwaghe, Biro byosi nasyamupipa. Omwatsi oyo lwimbo lwaghe, Biro byosi nasyamupipa.
songLyric.verse2: Namayiteka inatsema N’omw’ikirirya ngasung’Omwami. Akandetera Malaika, Bakanyiteya andamaye.
songLyric.verse3: Sindi n’ekindu akandwala, Mwisi wa Yesu inatsumulwa; Ngalindirira omw’isika, Bwenge buwe bunyitolere.

songLyric.verse1: Mo musalaba gh’Omulamya, Aho honasab’erilama, Mutima waghe kamweribwa, Na apipawe.
songLyric.chorus: Na apipawe, Na apipawe. Kwa a mwanyilamy’omo musasi Na apipawe.
songLyric.verse2: Ko Musalaba w’eryaghalwa, Yesu ane omo mutima. Kamwanyilamy’omo musasi, Na apipawe.
songLyric.verse3: Nyitsemire namabilama, Mwisi wa Yesu inatsumulwa; N’oko muti mwanyiholera, Na apipawe.
songLyric.verse4: Yesu kalamya mo musasi, Anyilusaya omo bibi, N’erinyitwala omw’ilama N’oko muti mwanyiholera, Na apipawe.

songLyric.verse1: Eribya wa Yesu kwehi ni sonda ryawe, Wangaghenda naye mo nzira enge, Ukasonda iwahek’omuheke wawe? Abye Omusondoli.
songLyric.chorus: Butoki buwe bukutolere. Musasi wuwe iniasyakwera, Ikw’ebyo iwaligha byowene Akol’erisonda liwe nawe.
songLyric.verse2: Ukasond’iwitaba wabirikirwa ko? Waban’obuholo wamuh’ebyosi? Wasond’obutoko isibakeha lino? Abye Omusondoli.
songLyric.verse3: Ukasond’obutseme omo Bwami buwe? Wangakinda omw’irengwa ko ryosi? Wangakola omubiri wuwe gho ndeke? Abye Omusondoli.

songLyric.verse1: Bindu byosi byowene, Hamaby’olwanzo, N’omulenge mubuya, Hamaby’olwanzo. Hali buholo aho, N’obutsem’omo nyumba, N’eribya ho ribuya, Hamaby’olwanzo.
songLyric.chorus: Hamabya Olwanzo, Biro byosi buholo; Hamaby’olwanzo.
songLyric.verse2: Butseme omo nyumba, Hamaby’olwanzo, Sihali eritsuro, Hamaby’olwanzo. Akalyo kakasiha, N’amalim’iniuwana, N’eribya ho ribuya, Hamaby’olwanzo.
songLyric.verse3: N’omo lubul’endata, Hali butseme, Bamalangir’olwanzi, Mo nyumba yetu. Meso akatsema n’ebihangikwa by’Omwami, Nyamuhang’inalenya, Hamaby’olwanzo.
songLyric.verse4: Uwe Yesu mbye wawe, Wawe kwenene, Neryo imo hasyabya, Lwanzo mo nyumba. Nasikala buholo, Indasyakol’ebibi, Nasyatsumulwa kundu, Hamaby’olwanzo.

songLyric.verse1: Tuhe omuliro wawe, W’eribya ho waka kera, Mowasondola endate, Ababuyirira bawe.
songLyric.verse2: Habo mwey’ow’abikere, Mo mweyo wa Ibrahimu, Kandi Mulikyetu Paulo, Atokesibwa Muliro.
songLyric.verse3: Lukogho lwawe siluli, N’amaka ebiro bino? Ng’omughulu owa Musa, Ayubu n’owa Eliya?
songLyric.verse4: Mughulu wa kera Mwami, Wibuke n’omw’ighenyera, Bukay’emitima yetu, Mo Muka Abuyirire.

title: MULI KAGHALA OMO MUSASI
englishTitle: There Is Power In The Blood

songLyric.verse1: Nikw’ukasond’erikind’ebibi, Kiriry’omusasi wa Yesu, Nikw’ukasond’eky’erikinda mo, Gh’omusasi gh’Omulamya.
songLyric.chorus: S-A : Muli kaghal’omo musasi, We Kyana ky’Embuli, Muli kaghal’omo musasi, Gh’Omwana wa Nyamuhanga. T-B : Kundu muli kaghala mo musasi, We Kyana ky’Embuli, Kundu muli kaghala mo musasi, Gh’Omwana
songLyric.verse2: Ukasonda neryo iweribwa, Kiriry’omusasi wa Yesu, Wase mweghay’oko musalaba, Akweray’omo musasi.
songLyric.verse3: Neryo ukasonda iwahenia, Kiriry’omusasi wa Yesu, Angakwery’ebitingu by’ebibi, Gh’omusasi gh’Omulamya.
songLyric.verse4: Ukasond’erikolera Yesu, Kiriry’omusasy’akalamya, Ukasonda waby’ukamupipa, Kiriry’omusasi Wuwe.

songLyric.verse1: Butseme, ritsema, twasyahabwa, Butseme, ritsema, twasyahabwa, Butseme, ritsema, twasyahabwa, Kiro Yesu asyasa.
songLyric.chorus: Kiro Yesu asyasa (Asa), Kiro Yesu asyasa (Asa), Butseme, ritsema, twasyahabwa, Kiro Yesu asyasa.
songLyric.verse2: Twasyimb’esyonyimbo sy’obutseme, Twasyimb’esyonyimbo sy’obutseme, Twasyimb’esyonyimbo sy’obutseme, Kiro Yesu asyasa.
songLyric.verse3: Sihali misonia asyabyasa, Sihali misonia asyabyasa, Sihali misonia asyabyasa, Kiro Yesu asyasa.
songLyric.verse4: N’eryaghalwa ryosi ryasahwa ho, N’eryaghalwa ryosi ryasahwa ho, N’eryaghalwa ryosi ryasahwa ho, Kiro Yesu asyasa.

songLyric.verse1: Yesu y’Omwira ulabire, Amalighe akwaghalya, Yukaseng’ebironda, by’omo mutima wawe, Yesu y’Omwira ulabire.
songLyric.chorus: Yesu’Mwira ulabire (Alabire), Yesu’Mwira ulabire (Alabire), Wamaw’iniakulamya, Walak’iniakowa, Yesu y’Omwira ulabire.
songLyric.verse2: Ngeghay’Omwira ulabire, Syalingung’omo malighe, Nyireke anzodole, Sihali Eryubaha, Yesu y’Omwira ulabire.
songLyric.verse3: Nery’obulighe bwamahika, Ibwandetera eryubaha, Sinzwek’omo mutima, Nikwa ambanganire, Yesu y’Omwira ulabire.
songLyric.verse4: Twasyabya twahik’elubula, Twahindana n’abo twasigha, Wasingya wasyabugha, Tukamupipa Iye, Yesu y’Omwira ulabire.

songLyric.verse1: Mwami apipaw’omo myatsi yosi, Olwanzo luwe ka mwatuma Yesu. Ka mwayiteka eribya ho liwe, Tubye neyo engebe y’erikota.
songLyric.chorus: Mupipe, mupipe, Ekihugho kyosi Mupipe, mupipe, Abandu batseme Na wase ku Tata, Ku Yesu Mwana Iwasyamup’omo myatsi yosi.
songLyric.verse2: Rilama ryoswire, Bihembo byetu, Ndaghane y’Omwami oko kihugho. Abakamwikiriraya kwenene; Abo bobawite eribuyirwa.
songLyric.verse3: Mwatukangirirya myatsi minene, Abiritubwir’erilama ryetu, Neryo eky’eriswekera kinene, Yesu akasyas’itwamulola ko.

songLyric.verse1: Omubuyirire, Mwami Mutoki, Mo ngyakyakya, twasyapip’itunemwimba. Omubuyirire, Mwami gh’olukogho, Mwami w’ebyosi, Kera na kera.
songLyric.verse2: Omubuyirire, N’Abalaika, Bangi kundu banemukusaba abosi. Kighonye n’ebighonye, banemukusaba, Oyutula na kera na kera.
songLyric.verse3: Omubuyirire, Yukalamaya, Omwirimya syalikubis’ekindu kyosi. Omubuyirire, Uwu wene kundu, Uli n’amaka mangi n’olwanzo.
